[list]

[*]3 variants

2900580391.title: '49 Dodge Power Wagon Crew Cab
2900580391.description:
First generation Dodge Power Wagon is a legend among pickup trucks. It is big, powerful and reliable. And if that is not enough for you, there is an Apocalypse variant that is even bigger and even more powerful, there is also a Police variant. All variants can be armored up with craftable armor. There are many parts available and most of them are craftable now. 

[b]Main features:[/b]
[list]
[*]3 Chassis variants with their own features: Stock, Police and Apocalypse
[*]Fully animated hood, trunk, doors and other parts
[*]Visible interior and character (with improved exit/enter/aim animations)
[*]Optional truck bed seat that can be used to shoot
[*]All parts have 3d objects you can remove and place in the world
[*]Many texture variations
[*]Armor protection for windows, doors, engine, headlights and even tires (fenders will save you with this one)
[*]Run-flat Tires for the Apocalypse variant- They will run even when damaged, but with reduced friction
[/list]
[b][list][*]B41 / B42 Compatible

[*]You can use it in your current save game, just enable the mod in the load menu

[*]Not recolorable

2478247379.title: '67 Cadillac Gage Commando
2478247379.description:
Time for some armored goodness! This armored Caddy will save you from the biggest horde, and everything pz can throw at you. When you are inside of it, you will only hear your heart and zombies pounding, but you are safe.

[b]Features:[/b]
[list]
[*]Fully animated hood, trunk and doors
[*]Visible interior and character (with improved exit/enter/aim animations)
[*]Custom parts have 3d objects you can remove and place in the world
[*][b]Run-flat Tires[/b] - They will run even when damaged, but with reduced friction
[*][b]Central tire inflation system[/b] - Monitors tire pressure, if it gets too low, it pumps it back up just like in rl
[*][b]Trunk[/b] is accessible from all seats or by opening rear doors from radial menu
[*][b]Gas tank[/b] is armored and will also not reduce in capacity when damaged, it actually has double the capacity of other vehicles
[*][b]Windows[/b] will crack but will not shatter, that is possible only in extreme high speed crashes
[*][b]Engine Door[/b] is armored and will not fully break
[*][b]Doors[/b] will never fully break
[/list]

[b]There are 3 variations:[/b]
[list]
[*]Normal vehicle
[*]Vehicle with T50 turret (it's just cosmetic, it can't shoot.)
[*]Police variant with lightbar and siren
[*]Burnt vehicle you will see in traffic jams etc
[/list]

There are many versions: USMC Green, NATO Green, NATO Black, Woodland Camo, Desert Camo, Desert Tan, KY Ranger, Police etc

[b][list]
[*]B41 / B42 Compatible
[*]New vehicle, not replacing any other
[*]You can use it in your current save game, just enable the mod in the load menu
[*]6 seats inside
[*]It can tow and be towed
[*]Not recolorable
[*]Should work with any other mods
[/list][/b]

2618213077.title: '82 Oshkosh M911 + Military Semi-Trailers
2618213077.description:
So you want to move your whole base to another location, or you want to hoard all the gas in Knox County, maybe you just want to steal all the fridges and get them to your super secret base, you do you, I'm just here to help.

M911 was the workhorse of US Armed forces for decades, his last job was to transport M1 Abrams tanks to battlefield. It's huge, it's ugly and it's one of the most iconic semi-trucks ever made. It comes in normal, armored and burnt flavor, with many texture variations.

[b]All variants include:[/b]
[list]
[*][b]Fully animated[/b] - They all come with 3d custom parts, animations and craftable armor
[*][b]Run-flat Tires[/b] - They will run even when damaged, but with reduced friction
[*][b]Central tire inflation system[/b] - Monitors tire pressure, if it gets too low, it pumps it back up just like in rl
[*][b]Lightbar[/b] - Make a distraction with some light and sound effects 
[*][b]Trunk[/b] is divided in 2 compartments (it's not huge, but you can organize your gear)
[*][b]Spare tire [/b]
[*][b]Gas tank[/b] is armored
[/list]

[b]Military Semi-Trailers[/b] (USMC Green, NATO Green, Desert Tan and Woodland camo)
[list]
[*][b]M126 Stake Semi-Trailer[/b]
[*][b]M127 Van Semi-Trailer[/b]
[*][b]M128 Van Semi-Trailer[/b]
[*][b]M747 Lowbed Semi-Trailer[/b]
[*][b]M967 Fuel Tanker Semi-Trailer[/b] (Requires [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2392709985]Tsar's Common Library[/url] to have fuel functionality)

[/list]

2811383142.title: '83 AM General M923
2811383142.description:
M923 is using the absolutely massive M939 chassis, so it's big, very big. Hillbilly got its name for the oxidised steel plates that were used to up armor it into a fortress on wheels. 3 seats in the front, 3 in the back. Back seat passengers can open their gunports to attack zeds, but because of their height zeds will not be able to get them. This part is still experimental and will see some improvements in the future, with aiming and animations in general.

Hillbilly is a gun truck first, so it is not meant for huge hauls since it has only 4 wheels in the back and the armor alone is heavy and is punishing the suspensions. Use Deuce for that. Use this one for ramming the hell out of traffic and zeds while clearing big zones. It sure can take the damage with the hillbilly bullbar.

[b]Main features:[/b]
[list]
[*]Fully animated hood, tailgate, doors and windows
[*]Visible interior and character (with improved exit/enter/aim animations)
[*]All parts have 3d objects you can remove and place in the world
[*]Extra parts to find in the world to make the vehicle truly yours (bullbars, armor plates, covers)
[*]Run-flat Tires - They will run even when damaged, but with reduced friction
[*]Many texture variations
[*]Detachable Spare tire, cab cover, flatbed armor, mudflaps etc
[*]Armor plates for windows and bumper protection[/list]

[b][list][*]B41.78+ Single Player / Multiplayer Compatible
[*]You can use it in your current save game, just enable the mod in the load menu
[*]It can tow and be towed
[*]Not recolorable
[/list][/b]
[b]Things to come:[/b]
[list]
[*]Soft top cab cover
[*]Better exit/enter and shooting animations
[*]Better shaders for part models so we can have better blood and damage on them
[/list]

If you can't wait to find this mod in your game and want to test it right away, use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2634426926]bikinitools[/url] to spawn it, hide the items that your character holds while in vehicle, or for all other good stuff that mod has, go get it!

2566953935.title: '86 Oshkosh P19A + Military Trailers
2566953935.description:
It's the end of the world, food, fuel and beer are running low, zombies are ruining every base you make, it's time to go full nomad. Move from place to place, loot all the places and move on. P19A is the perfect vehicle for that. Built to last for decades in warzones and harsh terrain. There are 4 variants, every with it's own set of unique features.

[b]Main features:[/b]
[list]
[*]3 Chassis variants: KY Fire Department, USMC Truck and Rare Fortress Truck (Burnt one included)
[*]They all have escape hatch on the roof that takes passenger of the 4th seat to the back left corner of truck
[*]Seats 3 and 4 can't be accessed by zombies, so they are good for sleeping in case you don't have armor plates.
[*]Fully animated hood, trunk doors, doors and windows
[*]Visible interior and character (with improved exit/enter/aim animations)
[*]All parts have 3d objects you can remove and place in the world
[*]Extra parts to find in the world to make the vehicle truly yours (fenders, armor plates, roofracks, spare tire mounts etc)
[*]Run-flat Tires - They will run even when damaged, but with reduced friction
[*]Many texture variations
[*]Armor plates for windows and engine protection[/list]

[b]Military Trailers[/b]
[list]
[*][b]M1082 Trailer[/b]
[*][b]M1082 Covered Trailer[/b]
[*][b]M1095 Trailer[/b]
[*][b]M1095 Covered Trailer[/b]
[/list]

Trailers are compatible with any military vehicle mods, just don't try to attach them to small cars, it will probably not work. 

[b][list]
[*]B41 / B42 Compatible

[*]You can use it in your current save game, just enable the mod in the load menu

2943194395.title: '89 Vauxhall Astra
2943194395.description:
[h2][b]'89 Vauxhall Astra[/b][/h2]

"The Vauxhall Astra 1989 model is a compact family car produced by British automaker Vauxhall Motors from 1984 to 1991. It was the second generation of the Astra series and was available in both hatchback and estate body styles.
The 1989 Vauxhall Astra was praised for its reliability, fuel efficiency, and handling. It was also one of the safest cars in its class, featuring a rigid body structure and a range of safety features such as anti-lock brakes and driver airbags.
Overall, the Vauxhall Astra 1989 model was a popular and well-regarded family car, known for its practicality, comfort, and safety features.

2968247750.title: '90 Mercedes-Benz 190E 2.5-16 Evolution II
2968247750.description:
[h2][b]'90 Mercedes-Benz 190E 2.5-16 Evolution II[/b][/h2]

The Mercedes-Benz 190 E 2.5-16 Evolution II is a sports sedan that was produced by Mercedes-Benz from 1990 to 1991. It was built as a homologation special to compete in the German Touring Car Championship (DTM), which required manufacturers to build a certain number of road-going versions of their race cars.
The 190 E 2.5-16 Evolution II was based on the Mercedes-Benz 190 E 2.5-16, which had been introduced in 1988. However, the Evolution II featured significant upgrades to its engine, suspension, and aerodynamics. The car was powered by a 2.5-liter, 16-valve, inline-four engine that produced 235 horsepower and 181 lb-ft of torque. It had a top speed of 155 mph and could accelerate from 0-60 mph in 7 seconds.
The Evolution II's suspension was lowered and stiffened, and it featured larger brakes and wider tires than the standard 190 E. The car also had a distinctive body kit that included an adjustable rear wing, flared fenders, and a front air dam. The body kit was designed to improve the car's aerodynamics and stability at high speeds.
Only 502 examples of the Mercedes-Benz 190 E 2.5-16 Evolution II were produced, making it a rare and highly sought-after collector car. Its unique design, high performance, and racing pedigree set it apart from other sports sedans of its time, and it remains a favorite among Mercedes-Benz enthusiasts today.

[h2][b]Features[/b][/h2]
[list]
[*]Fully animated with visible passengers.
[*]2 liveries with accurate colors for 190E 2.5-16 Evolution II.
[*]Craftable armor protecting Hood, Windows, Windshields and Doors.
[*]All parts are removeable with their own 3d models and item types.
[*]Four seats,
[/list]

This mod is made with support of Tanka The Maid. I would like to thank Tanka for their support and end with their message.
[quote=Tanka The Maid]I would like to dedicate this mod to my dad & wish him a happy birthday[/quote]

3008795514.title: '91 Geo Metro
3008795514.description:
A perfect starter car! Small, easy to maintain and armor up with some common materials. Grab some planks, nails and screws and build your little crappy wooden fortress on wheels. The wood will not be able to take much punishment but it will be enough to keep you alive if you maintain it. Reinforce the bumper with planks and even make a wooden roofrack! When the armor is too damaged to keep you safe, just dismantle it to get some firewood and maybe even some useful stuff back. 

[b]Main features:[/b]
[list]
[*]Wooden armor that will help low skill characters to survive longer
[*]2 front Bumpers/Bullbars and 1 rear Bumper with 2 tiered protection
[*]Fully animated hood, trunk, doors and windows
[*]Visible interior and character (with improved exit/enter/aim animations)
[*]All parts have 3d objects you can remove and place in the world

2897390033.title: '97 ADI Bushmaster
2897390033.description:
It's 1997, Australia was under a full quarantine for four long years, but they managed to keep the virus out. Now, they are sending their first RECON teams around the world, and one of the highest priorities is the Knox County. A few small teams have tried to enter it from different sides, but as soon as they got near the barricades, strange things started happening... 

Bushmaster will not spawn in the normal zones but it has a chance to spawn on a few county barricades and some secret locations around the map, those specials spawns are very rare. Spawns can be completely disabled from the sandbox settings, they are also not affected by the normal map conditions, so you will see them spawn in visited areas, if you are lucky.

[b]Main features:[/b]
[list]
[*]2 Chassis variants with their own features:
Utility(10 seats + Gunner) and Ambulance (6 Seats + Gunner + Stretcher)
[*]Fully animated hood, trunk, doors and other parts
[*]Visible interior and character (with improved exit/enter/aim animations)
[*]Openable roof hatch that can be used to shoot
[*]All parts have 3d objects you can remove and place in the world
[*]Side storages can be removed and replaced with other items, it can carry a generator or a spare tire instead
[*]Roof can hold additional storage and another spare tire
[*]Many texture variations
[*]Armor protection for windows, doors, engine, headlights etc
[*]Run-flat Tires - They will run even when damaged, but with reduced friction
[*]Central tire inflation system - Monitors tire pressure, if it gets too low, it pumps it back up just like in rl
[/list]
[b][list][*]B41.78+ Single Player / Multiplayer Compatible
[*]You can enable/disable it's spawn in sandbox settings for mp

[*]Not recolorable
[/list][/b]

3051276857.title: [KYR] Real Weather Mod
3051276857.description:
[h1][KYR] Gaming Community – Real Weather Mod[/h1]
[b]Please take the time to leave Feedback, Suggestions and Ratings [/b]

[h2] Support, News and Updates: [/h2]
For feedback, the latest news on updates, new mods, and upcoming features, please come and follow/support us:
https://ko-fi.com/kyrgaming 
https://discord.gg/cWUETQmas9

A huge amount of time and care goes into our mods and we’re very receptive on feedback and bug reports. If you’ve found something that doesn’t make you smile, please give us a shout!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h2] Mod Summary [/h2]
This Mod brings some slightly challenging and more lifelike feel to the in-game weather systems. This will bring extremely hot summers (topping 100). This gives fatigue affects if temperatures aren’t managed correctly.

Winter will also drop well into sub-zero temperatures, meaning you’ll need to deal with the environment like never before!

As always, our mods will make things slightly more challenging. We’re extremely careful to always keep things balanced and in tune with the base game though.

WARNING: We have NOT tested values at the extreme ends of the available scales. If you insist on changing the settings to options this extreme, we are unable to advise on the effects this may have on your world and characters!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h2] LATEST UPDATES [/h2] – v4.0.0 - 07/01/25
This mod now fully supports B42
This mod WILL STILL work with B41
FULL customization of Weather
We’ve left the default settings as they were, tweak for you preference!

v3.1.1 - 15/09/24
Latitude Cap Introduced at 65 (Thank You Community Feedback!)

v3.1.0 - 23/06/24
More Frequent Update Calls For Weather Added – Variable changes now fully working and take affect quicker!
(Single-Player - on game load)
(Multi-Player - once a month)
Higher Default Max Temp Set (35 instead of 30)
Lower Latitude Value (40 instead of 41)
Variable Caching Bug Fixed

v3.0.0 – 25/04/24
Complete File Renaming Overhaul!
We Noticed some files in our own Modlists we’re conflicting. As part of some large re-writes going on at the moment, we’ve rolled out a new naming convention across all our mods. This should eliminate some edge case errors and pave the way for the new content.

v2.2 – 19/01/2024
Min Temp to -170 Degrees for Cryo Enjoyers!
Max Season Variation increased to 40

v2.1
SANDBOX OPTIONS EXPANDED!
Default Latitude Tweaked Slightly

v2.0
SANDBOX OPTIONS ADDED!

v1.1 – 16/10/023
BUG FIX! – (Code Typo)

v1.0 - 15/10/23 
Launched! 

[h3] COMING SOON! [/h3]
Not Sure!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h2] Main Features [/h2]

[h3]Weather, Daylight and Temp Changes[/h3] 

This Mod will bring:
-       Full Weather Customisation

By Default:
-	Warmer Summers 
-	Colder Winters
-	More variation in Season temperature
-	More variation in Daylight hours (longer summer days, longer winter nights)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h2] Mod Options [/h2]
[b]Latitude Variation[/b] – This will control the position in latitude of your Game World on the Real World. We have set this slightly higher than the default to give a more accurate reading for KY and hence more accurate weather. Adjust this as you wish, further North (higher value) will result in Milder Summers, Colder Winters, shorter summer nights etc.

[b]Max Temp[/b] – This will control the Maximum Temperature you’re Game World can reach.

[b]Min Temp[/b] – This will control the Minimum Temperature you’re Game World can reach.

[b]Season Variation[/b] – This will control the variation in Seasons between years. So think along the lines of 1993 mild summer, wet winter etc., higher value means more variation. We recommend 9 here to accurately reflect some of the insane Weather changes witnessed at speed in KY. Increase further at your own risk.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h2] Our Other Mods: [/h2]

KYR Meds, Delays and Cures:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3029240588

KYR Improvised Weapons & Armour:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3099108027 

KYR Survival and Crafting:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2935985690 

KYR Heavy Metal:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3009338583
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h3] Our Community & Servers[/h3]
[KYR] is a Growing PZ Community. We've got a number of Servers, our own Mod Making, Events and More!

#1.) The Easy Life – Public – 109.228.38.147:16261
#2.) Middle of the Road – Whitelisted - 109.228.38.147:16263
#3.) Hell – Whitelisted - 109.228.38.147:16265

<S.C.A.R.S> Content - The Survivor Co-ordination & Response System. This bot controls the Whitelisting access of our servers, cooldown times, real time stats and unique content like Air Drops for our community members from our Discord Channel!

This also runs our channel ranking system where members are promoted through survivor ranks based on skills and kills over multiple games.

Come and Join Us! - https://discord.gg/mRCBa9jHRq/ 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h3] FAQ's [/h3]

Q. Is it MP Compatible?
A. Yes, all our mods are built and tested on our live servers!

Q. Can I add to an existing save?
A. Yes, the Mod is self-contained and so perfectly safe to do so!

Q. Is this Compatible with other mods?
A. Yes, however, we would strongly recommend against mixing with other weather mods as problems will likely occur!

Q. I found a Bug!
A. Please Join Our Discord and let us know, most of the time we can fix things within 24hours!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h3] Respect... [/h3]
Please don't add this mod to Collections or Server packs without Our permission. 

[h3] Special Mention! [/h3]
'0x2ba22e11' from the [KYR] Community 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h3] Workshop Details [/h3]
Workshop ID: 3051276857
Mod ID: KYRRealWeatherMod

2604943386.title: Addicted To Weight
2604943386.description:
[h1][b]Since v1.16, sound notifications for weight changes are enabled by default. If you prefer not to receive notifications via beep sound, please adjust the settings in the options.[/b][/h1]
[img]https://imgur.com/XKBrRNF.png[/img]

[h1]Overview :[/h1]
Display weight information on digital watch panel.
[b][i]Confirmed to work with Build 41/42 and also work on MP.[/i][/b]

[h1]Features :[/h1]
[list]
[*]Displays the weight information as a number (integer part) and a gauge (first decimal place).
[*]Displays the weight Increase/Decrease status based on calorie intake.
[*]Displays the timezone information as DAY/NIGHT icons (switch at 6:00 and 18:00).
[*]Notifies with an sound alert when weight changes.
[/list]

[h1]Options :[/h1]
These options are available with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2169435993]Mod Options[/url] in B41.
[list]
[*]Show Human Icon : Can specify whether to show or hide.
[*]Sound Notification Timing : You can change the timing for sound notifications.
[*]Sound Volume (Increase) : You can adjust the sound volume when the weight increases.
[*]Sound Volume (Decrease) : You can adjust the sound volume when the weight decreases.
[/list]

[h1]Known Issues :[/h1]
[list]
[*]Nothing at this time.
[/list]

[h1]Future plans :[/h1]
[list]
[*]Improvement display for "Clock display size : Small"
[*]Bug fix (if exists)
[/list]

[h1]Remarks :[/h1]
[list]
[*]You may add it to your mod pack without confirmation and credit. However, please use at your own risk, as I have not been able to verify that it works with SP.
[/list]

[h1]Release Notes :[/h1]
[list]
[*]v1.20 - Improved Sound Effects.
[*]v1.19 - Supported options for Build 42.
[*]v1.18 - Compatible with Build 42.
[*]v1.17 - Added sound timing options.
[*]v1.16 - Added sound volume options.
Please refer to "Change Notes" for the older history.
[/list]

[code]
If you enjoy this mod and would like to support its development, you can do so through the services below. Your support helps keep me motivated and allows me to continue improving and updating the mod. All contributions will be used for development purposes, such as AI service subscriptions. 

[url=https://buymeacoffee.com/pepepepepeil][img]https://imgur.com/7QRjOtP.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://ko-fi.com/pepepepepeil][img]https://i.imgur.com/ULMwSUt.png[/img][/url]
[/code]

Workshop ID: 2604943386
Mod ID: P4AddictedToWeight

2992977067.description:

3036878362.title: Advanced Trajectory's Realistic Overhaul
3036878362.description:
This is a realistic overhaul of a mod called Advanced Trajectory. It tries to involve as much player skill as possible while having PZ's RPG mechanics such as moodles play a big role during gunplay.

[h3]If the mod is too easy or hard, nearly everything can be customized in the sandbox options.[/h3]

[b]If hosting a server, disable Anticheat 12 to prevent players from being kicked from no clipping from True Crawl/Crouch mod.[/b]

[b]If you are running into any errors, make sure you are not subscribed to any third party ATRO patches as they may be outdated.[/b]

[h1]B41 + B42 Update 2/20/25: Check change notes to see info about previous updates.[/h1]
[list]
[*] Fixed PVP not working when ShowSafety is unchecked
[/list]

[h1]Many changes and fixes to Advanced Trajectory. Watch the video for an overview of the core changes. A lot has changed so make sure to also read past change notes.[/h1]

[h3]Gunplay (keyword is bloom)[/h3]
At levels 3 to 10, the gunplay works similarly to Resident Evil 2 Remake meaning the player has to wait a bit for the character to "focus" and aim for their target before hitting an accurate shot. For example, a player is aiming and standing still leading the bloom value to go from 100 to 30. Once the bloom reaches 30, it waits for a second or two before reducing to 0. A value below 5 (crosshair changes color) is what you want as it allows you to deal the most damage when aiming for the head, otherwise, it will be treated as body damage. So don't waste your ammo spraying bullets because you'll either miss or do little damage. Let's call this whole thing the "focus mechanic" for the sake of naming.

[h3]Higher level = higher accuracy and crit chance, less chance of missing[/h3]
[list]
[*] levels 0 to 2: very bad at shooting with anything but shotguns; player is limited to only dealing body and foot damage, but is not limited to dealing crit damage
[*] level 3: focus mechanic is unlocked which allows the player to get an accurate shot on a target from afar (can hit headshots)
[*] level 6+: bloom reduction rate is capped and no longer scales, however the crosshair will continue to get smaller the higher level you are
[*] level 10: player can run n gun and is a headshot machine (if stationary)
[/list]

[h3]Hit/Miss (Can be disabled)[/h3]
When the crosshair is slightly transparent at a certain bloom (which is dependent on aiming level), RNG will begin to play a role in determining whether or not the individual projectile will hit their target. Shotguns give a significant buff in increasing the bloom in which the RNG will be in effect.

[h3]Distance Penalty (Can be disabled)[/h3]
Crosshair will get bigger after a certain distance. The penalty is less severe the higher the aiming level and the longer the weapon range.

[h3]Moodles[/h3]
[list]
[*] [b]Has a Cold[/b]: sneezing adds a big burst of bloom whereas coughing adds a little
[*] [b]Drunk[/b]: more bloom is added when moving and turning
[*] [b]Endurance[/b]: aim sways a lot
[*] [b]Hyperthermia/Hypothermia[/b]: slows bloom rate reduction
[*] [b]Fatigue[/b]: slows bloom rate reduction drastically
[*] [b]Stress[/b]: limits the value of how small bloom can reduce to and makes crosshair shaky
[*] [b]Pain[/b]: slows bloom rate reduction, adds shaky visual effect to crosshair, and limits how small bloom can reduce to
[*] [b]Panic[/b]: increases effect of distance penalty and makes crosshair shaky
[*] [b]Heavy[/b]: Similar to drunkness, penalty when moving and turning is amplified. In addition, stamina consumption when switching stances is increased and more bloom will be added when switching between crouch and stand stance.
[/list]

[h3]Weapon Attachments[/h3]
If you deck out your weapon, you will have a much easier time shooting. It can even nullify negative effects at a certain level.
[list]
[*] AimingTime(+) => Increases bloom reduction
[*] HitChance(+)   => Shortens focus timer
[*] Recoil(-)           => Reduces recoil
[*] Range(+)          => Increases range
[/list]

[h3]True Crouch and True Crawl Support[/h3]
Not required, but a necessity for a full and funner experience.
[list]
[*] Switching stances will consume stamina based on fitness level and heavy moodle level. Switching stances between crouch and stand adds bloom while aiming.
[h3]Crouch[/h3]
[list]
[*] When performed, bloom is reduced for levels that have not unlocked the focus mechanic
[*] Bloom reduction rate is increased for all levels, helps a lot when exhausted
[*] Can burst a few bullets while ignoring the focus timer depending on the level and recoil
[*] Is OP when your gun is decked with attachments
[/list]
[h3]Crawl/Prone[/h3]
[list]
[*] you get effects from crouch but better and faster time to focus (less time waiting at minaimnum)
[*] recoil reduced by half
[/list]
[/list]

[h1]Suggested Mods [B41][/h1]
[h3]Alternative Crosshair for ammo counter near crosshair[/h3]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2814165668][img]https://i.imgur.com/VMisKHG.png[/img][/url]
To set it up, you'll need the "Mod Options" mod to make changes to the Alt. Crosshair. Go to your settings and locate Mod Options -> Alt. Crosshair, then set Ranged Weapon Crosshair to "IsoCursorFade" or "IsoCursorOpaque". After that, turn down the transparency of the vanilla isometric cursor in the main settings tab.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WPheCdG.png[/img]

[h3]Brita's Bow Dupe Fix for ATRO (Brita users only)[/h3]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3132933898][img]https://i.imgur.com/8FF2EbF.png[/img][/url]
To get the bows to work properly, download the fix and have it loaded after Brita's Weapon Pack. Then go to sandbox options -> ATRO[DEBUG] and check debugEnableBow. That's all you need to do.

[h1]FAQ (MORE IN DISCUSSION SECTION) [/h1]
[b]Does this work with multiplayer?[/b]
Yes.

[b]Do I need the original Advanced Trajectory mod?[/b]
No, this mod is all you need.

[b]Does this work with existing saves and can I remove them mid save?[/b]
Yes and yes.

[b]Does this work with splitscreen or controller?[/b]
No.

[b]Does this work with other weapon mods?[/b]
Yes.

[b]Do I really need True Crouch and True Crawl [B41]?[/b]
No, but it is RECOMMENDED for a full experience.

[b]I'm missing my shots on zombies with 0 bloom. Why?[/b]
The mod's crosshair is not always accurate. Sometimes, you must use the vanilla's isometric cursor. Make sure the base of the cursor is on their center of gravity.

[b]It takes too long for the bloom to get to 0, how do I make it faster?[/b]
You can go to the sandbox options and increase the value of "Focus Counter Speed".

[b]How do I get rid of the crosshair's low framerate?[/b]
Uncheck "UI Offscreen Rendering" in your settings.

[b]Does this work with Superb Survivors or any NPC mod?[/b]
Yes, enable "Ignore PVP Safety" in sandbox options so you can damage NPCs with guns.

[b]How to get rid of vanilla crosshair?[/b]
There should be an option to hide it in settings if you press ESC.

[b]I'm seeing 2 bullets being shot at once. How do I fix this? [B42][/b]
One bullet is from ATRO and the other bullet is from vanilla. PLEASE LOCATE ATRO MOD FOLDER THEN GO TO "42\media\effects" and copy and paste the tracer files (ignore vanilla backup folder) into "steamapps\common\ProjectZomboid\media\effects" to override. Do not enable hide tracer option in sandbox.

[b]Credits: [/b]
[b]???? and ????[/b] for creating Advanced Trajectory
[b]Lisola[/b] for arrow and bolts and manual z aim code
[b]Bambino[/b] for insight and help on the PVP update
[b]dr fish / drfishetti[/b] for adding new bullet wounds
[b]inkredibehl  for french translation

2788256295.title: Ammo Maker
2788256295.description:
Adds raw materials and recipes to produce gunpowder and ammo from scratch and uses realistic amounts of gunpowder and metal for each calibre. Supports 53 calibres from 18 different gun mods and the base game.

With B42 many things have changed in Ammo Maker and most of the mod has been rewritten. The focus was to make use of the new B42 tech-tree that includes furnaces and forges for metal working. From dropping casings when firing guns and reusing them with castable bullets, to the production of casings from scratch mid to late game. There is also a forgeable reloading press for bulk crafting ammo now. Support for other gun mods got addressed with an all-new dynamic recipe system with centralised ammo data.
Ammo Maker continues to focus on natural progression with unique assets and processes.

[list]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/2788256295]For more information about the new B42 version of Ammo Maker have a look at the release notes from 2025-01-10 and after[/url] ... [url=https://discord.gg/GatzBH78Rj]or join the discord server.[/url]
[/list]

The B41 version of the mod is not affected by these changes. Description on Steam gets updated once B42 is stable.

[quote][h2]Join Ammo Maker on Discord[/h2]
https://discord.gg/GatzBH78Rj
[list]
[*]Full mod description
[*]List of all items and recipes
[*]List of planned features and fixes
[*]Discuss ideas for new features
[*]Report bugs
[/list][/quote]

[quote][h2]Support the development[/h2]
If you enjoy Ammo Maker please [b]like[/b] 👍 and [b]favourite[/b] 🌟

Check-out our merch store 👕
https://njb.design/store/products

Donate via PayPal 💸
https://www.paypal.com/ncp/payment/B25MW3LUV22PN

Get one of our games here on Steam 🎮
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1527080/

We appreciate your support![/quote]

[h2]FAQ (B41) 💡[/h2]
[list]
[*][b]Will Ammo Maker add recipes for mods that I have not installed?[/b]
No, Ammo Maker has a dynamic recipe manager that only shows the recipes for the mods that are active

[*][b]How can I make charcoal with Ammo Maker?[/b]
While standing next to a campfire you can make charcoal from logs (2x) or tree branches (18x)

[*][b]Can the Ammo Maker charcoal recipes be deactivated?[/b]
Yes, they can be deactivated with the 'Deactivate Charcoal Recipes' sandbox option

[*][b]How can I make charcoal with the base game?[/b]
It can be made by putting logs in a metal drum and lighting them

[*][b]Where can I find bird excrement?[/b]
Bird excrement can be found in all zones using the foraging mode with the 'bird products' search focus

[*][b]Is there a stationary method to produce bird excrement?[/b]
Yes, if you have reached carpentry level 4 you can build the bird feeder that converts seeds into bird excrement

[*][b]Does the bird feeder work anywhere and anytime?[/b]
No, it only works outdoors and during daytime

[*][b]What can Ammo Maker bolts and arrows be used for?[/b]
They can be converted into equivalents of the Arsenal GunFighter [AGF] mod only at this point

[*][b]Can the Ammo Maker archery recipes and items like bird feathers be deactivated?[/b]
Yes, they can be deactivated with the 'Activate Archery' sandbox option
[/list]

[h2]Bird Feeder (B41) 🐦[/h2]
[list]
[*]Converts seeds into bird excrement and bird feathers from 05:00 to 21:00
[*]Only works outdoors
[*]Build option in the world right click menu 'Carpentry/Ammo Maker'
[*]Build needs:
[list]
[*]Materials: 2x Plank ; 2x Nails
[*]Tools: Hammer ; Saw
[*]Skills: Carpentry 4
[/list]

[*][url=https://discord.gg/GatzBH78Rj]Join Ammo Maker on Discord for the full list of supported seeds[/url]
[/list]

[h2]Sandbox Options (B41) 🔧[/h2]
[list]
[*]Nitre Yield: Nitre per pot of bird excrement
    Default: 10 | Range: 1-100
[*]Bird Excrement Yield: Bird excrement per seed (bird feeder)
    Default: 1 | Range: 1-5
[*]Bird Excrement Spawn Min: Minimum spawn amount per pile (foraging)
    Default: 8 | Range: 1-200
[*]Bird Excrement Spawn Max: Maximum spawn amount per pile (foraging)
    Default: 24 | Range: 1-200
[*]Deactivate Charcoal Recipes: Deactivates ammo maker charcoal recipes
    Default: false
[*]Activate Archery: Activates ammo maker archery components
    Default: true
[/list]

[h2]Compatibility (B41) 🔌[/h2]

Some features only available in English for now, looking for translators to help.

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/2071347174/2264691117423886541/][h3]Don't like pictures? Here's a written description of the mod.[/h3][/url]
[img=]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1018320033333686586/CDF15798CE4108E5D85C4F4C5CE3159F0EF4B36B/[/img]

[h1]Flag Books as Owned: You can now instantly 'read' the first page of advanced books. If you find a new copy you will now be able to tell that you already own one.[/h1]
[h3]This will not affect the time it takes to read that book once you are ready for it. Your character will even re-read the first page![/h3]

[h1]Magazines now all have unique icons. Chapter is denoted by color and visible numbers. Similar books share logos and main color palette.[/h1]
[img=]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1018320033333556248/B5918DA8B4EF0342A1F1889AA2542EA0115E5249/[/img]
[h3]Modders: You may notice I made a bunch of extras. Feel free to use them in your own work![/h3]

[img=]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1018320153791790613/EC5D48FE83FCE0256367DF29A97BE163C1008D59/[/img]

[img=]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1018320033333686586/CDF15798CE4108E5D85C4F4C5CE3159F0EF4B36B/[/img]

[h3]Enjoy the mod? I would love it if you gave me some fake internet points. They are easy to give, and totally free![/h3]
[img=]https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]

[img=]https://i.imgur.com/jEczML7.png[/img]

3015577318.title: AutoHide Hotbar
3015577318.description:
[h1][b]AutoHide Hotbar[/b][/h1]
Do you get bothered when all the extra hotbar slots you have are clipping thought the Vehicle Dashboard when driving? Well, so this mod is for you!
All it does is simply hide the hotbar automatically when you are driving.

[hr][/hr]
[h2][b]How it works:[/b][/h2]
First, it checks if the player is inside a vehicle, then do another check if the player is the driver.
If all checks are true, it disables the hotbar renderer until any check return false
(Because of that, only hides the hotbar it if the Vehicle Dashboard is being rendered)
[img]https://i.imgur.com/myGiLig.gif[/img]

[hr][/hr]
[h2][b]Questions:[/b][/h2]
[h3]Is it compatible with Multiplayer?[/h3]
Yes!
[h3]Does it work on existing saves?[/h3]
Yes! It can be enabled/disabled mid-save without any problems.
[h3]Does it work for all game versions?[/h3]
Only tested and working on current game version: 41.78.16
[h3]Is it compatible with X mod?[/h3]
Probably yes.
It hooks on the ISHotbar:render() function, but was done in a way that should be always compatible with any mod that hooks that function too.

[hr][/hr]
[h2][b]Credits:[/b][/h2]
The mod used in the example is [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2713921292]Undead Survivor[/url].
As always, a big thank you to everyone in #mod_development on the official [url=https://discord.gg/theindiestone]Project Zomboid Discord[/url]

[h2][b]Found any bugs?[/b][/h2]
If you encounter any errors or bugs, report them according to the first post in the pinned discussion [i][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/3014820613/3803904729133227446/]Bug Reports[/url][/i].
For any questions, please be kind and leave a comment below!

[hr][/hr]
[h2][b]Don't forget to rate and favorite![/b][/h2]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/eZp8dXD.gif[/img]
[h2][b]Permissions[/b][/h2]
[code]This mod's permissions fall under TIS's policy [url=http://theindiestone.com/forums/index.php/topic/2530-mod-permissions/?p=36478][b]Ask For Permission[/b][/url]
[url=https://theindiestone.com/forums/index.php/topic/2530-mod-permissions/?p=36478][img]https://i.imgur.com/l9ciVMC.png[/img][/url]
This mod can only be added to and extended with the express permission from the original creator. Having received permission, credit must be given to the original creator, both within the files of the mod and wherever the mod roams online.

If no permission is received you may not alter the mod, and it must be treated as a mod that is [b]'On Lockdown'[/b].[/code]

[h2][b]If you like this mod, check out my [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/peter_pg/myworkshopfiles/?appid=108600]other mods![/url][/b][/h2]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3014820613][img]https://i.imgur.com/7aj67yh.png[/img][/url][noparse] [/noparse][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3022092965][img]https://i.imgur.com/jC583Uz.png[/img][/url][noparse] [/noparse][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2867849772][img]https://i.imgur.com/9tW3MhB.png[/img][/url][noparse] [/noparse][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3016740715][img]https://i.imgur.com/WMhLAC8.png[/img][/url][noparse] [/noparse][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3022138448][img]https://i.imgur.com/4VfCAU0.png[/img][/url][noparse] [/noparse][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2868160259][img]https://i.imgur.com/At5BNfO.png[/img][/url][noparse] [/noparse][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2866387203][img]https://i.imgur.com/c40tOHD.png[/img][/url][noparse] [/noparse][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2866386261][img]https://i.imgur.com/OXCEh80.png[/img][/url][noparse] [/noparse][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2868161963][img]https://i.imgur.com/HA9pSVM.png[/img][/url][noparse] [/noparse][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2866727163][img]https://i.imgur.com/E1Il9zY.png[/img][/url][noparse] [/noparse]

3014820613.title: Automatic Gate Motors
3014820613.description:
[h2][b]Automatic Gate Motors[/b][/h2]
Adds ways of remotely open and close gates that where built by a player.
[h3][i]New Update! - Version 1.1.6[/i][/h3]
To check out all the new features, take a look at the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/3014820613]Changelog[/url]!
[b]If you have a server, be sure that [i]BackupOnStart=true[/i] on server settings (or have a backup) to avoid issues![/b]

[hr][/hr]
[h2][b]Features:[/b][/h2]
Adds 3 new items: Automatic Gate Controller, Automatic Gate Motor and a new magazine: (see [i]How to use it?[/i])
[list]
[*] The Automatic Gate Motor can be crafted and installed on any gate that can be built by the player, turning it into a Automatic Gate.
(Can't be installed on garage doors or gates that already exists and can't be build by the player)
[*] The Automatic Gate Controller can be connected to a Automatic Gate to interact with it.
[*] The new magazine is called "All about Automatic Gates" and enables the player to craft all the above mentioned items.
[/list]
Apart from new content, there also a few features to help with player interactions and enables the Mod to be more flexible
[list]
[*] There are feedbacks to the player in almost every action related to the Mod.
[*] The tooltips are very self-explanatory to help the player figure out things.
[*] The Mod is completely translate-able (See pinned discussion for [i][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/3014820613/3803904729133209748/]Translations[/url][/i]).
[*] A lot of things can be changed via the [i]Sandbox Settings[/i], including skill level requirements for crafting and other settings.
[/list]

[hr][/hr]
[h2][b]How to use it?[/b][/h2]
[olist]
[*] Find the magazine "All about Automatic Gates" to learn the recipes and how to install the motor.
[*] Craft a Automatic Gate Motor and a Automatic Gate Controller
[*] Install the Motor on a gate using a Propane Torch and Welding Rods (option only shows if you read the magazine and have a Propane Torch and a Welder Mask)
[*] You can connect the Controller to the Automatic Gate to use it
[/olist]
[list]
[*] To open/close, the gate needs any car battery inside it's new container (corner part)
[*] The gate can be locked/unlocked (automatically/manually) using a Controller (automation part can be changed via [i]Sandbox Settings[/i])
[*] The gate can be renamed. Controllers will have the current name of the gate, and will update automatically on change.
[*] The Controller have a maximum range to work (can be changed via [i]Sandbox Settings[/i])
[*] The Controller can be attached and used on the Belt (On a Gamepad, use the Left-DPad RadialMenu)
[*] You can Double-Click on the Controller to use it
[/list]
This should be everything you need to know to use get around how to use the mod.
If you want to know more and don't care about spoilers, I recommend you read the full [i][url=https://pastebin.com/hkmKRrBC]List of Features[/url][/i]

[h3][b]BE CAREFUL![/b][/h3]
If the gate is locked, you cannot connect another controller directly to it.
So, if you have no controllers connected to a gate, and it is locked, the only solution is to [b][i]DESTROY[/i][/b] the gate and build a new one.
This is done for security reasons (MP). If you have a idea on how to do it better, see pinned discussion [i][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/3014820613/3803904729133220657/]Suggestions[/url][/i].

[hr][/hr]
[h2][b]Questions:[/b][/h2]
[h3]Is it compatible with Multiplayer?[/h3]
Yes! All the testing was done using the "Host" option, and all features are working without problems.
[h3]Does it work on existing saves?[/h3]
Yes! It can be enabled mid-save without any problems.
You will just need to explore new areas to get the Magazine, or (spoiler):
[spoiler]Create a new survivor with the Engineer profession (already existing engineers will not know the recipes)[/spoiler]
(If you already have motors installed there may be problems with disabling)
[h3]Does it work for all game versions?[/h3]
Only tested on current game version: 41.78.16
[h3]What mods it is incompatible?[/h3]
Currently, the only incompatible mod know is [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3209239259]Sensors and Traps[/url].

[hr][/hr]
[h2][b]Translations:[/b][/h2]
[list]
[*] English
[*] Brazilian-Portuguese
[*] Russian (Thanks for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198814040752]666rdsrds666[/url])
[*] Korean (Thanks for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/BeDuck]BeDuck[/url])
[*] Simplified Chinese (Thanks for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198224708128]Phoenix[/url])
[*] Italian (Thanks for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198891467363]Astram[/url])
[*] French (Thanks for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/commanderbondt]Commander[/url])
[*] Spanish (Thanks for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198196394297]Antonete2005[/url])
[*] Polish (Thanks for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198361051869]Miki[/url])
[/list]

[h2][b]Planned Features:[/b][/h2]
[list]
[*] [strike]Keybindings[/strike] - Added on v1.1.0, with Belt attachment (Suggested by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198891467363]Astram[/url])
[*] [strike]Renaming Gates[/strike] - Added on v1.1.0, compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2880687295]Rename Containers[/url]
[*] Master Controller
[*] Proximity sensors
[/list]

[h2][b]Found any bugs?[/b][/h2]
This is actually my first Lua mod, expect things to (sometimes) not work properly.
If you encounter any errors or bugs, report them according to the first post in the pinned discussion [i][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/3014820613/3803904729133227446/]Bug Reports[/url][/i].
For any questions, please be kind and leave a comment below!

[h2][b]Credits:[/b][/h2]
The idea of making this mod came from [i][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2735447453]this[/url][/i].
My mod was made from scratch, but was that mod that got me all the inspiration to make my own, and credits should be given ;)
I would also like to thank everyone in #mod_development on the official [url=https://discord.gg/theindiestone]Project Zomboid Discord[/url] (especially @albion =D)

[hr][/hr]
[h2][b]Don't forget to rate and favorite![/b][/h2]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/eZp8dXD.gif[/img]
[h2][b]Permissions[/b][/h2]
[code]This mod's permissions fall under TIS's policy [url=http://theindiestone.com/forums/index.php/topic/2530-mod-permissions/?p=36478][b]Ask For Permission[/b][/url]
[url=https://theindiestone.com/forums/index.php/topic/2530-mod-permissions/?p=36478][img]https://i.imgur.com/l9ciVMC.png[/img][/url]
This mod can only be added to and extended with the express permission from the original creator. Having received permission, credit must be given to the original creator, both within the files of the mod and wherever the mod roams online.

If no permission is received you may not alter the mod, and it must be treated as a mod that is [b]'On Lockdown'[/b].[/code]

[h2][b]If you like this mod, check out my [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/peter_pg/myworkshopfiles/?appid=108600]other mods![/url][/b][/h2]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3015577318][img]https://i.imgur.com/YnOISyA.png[/img][/url][noparse] [/noparse][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3022092965][img]https://i.imgur.com/jC583Uz.png[/img][/url][noparse] [/noparse][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2867849772][img]https://i.imgur.com/9tW3MhB.png[/img][/url][noparse] [/noparse][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3022138448][img]https://i.imgur.com/4VfCAU0.png[/img][/url][noparse] [/noparse]

[hr][/hr]

Mod ID: AutomaticGateMotors

2588598892.title: Auto Mechanics B41
2588598892.description:
So you are here ?
Ah.. you wanna play with cars but you lack experience.
You've come to the right place.

At least if you are using B41 or previous versions.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3387539308]The version for B42 and further versions if here.[/url]
All questions that are not answered below will be answered by the community on the [url=https://discord.gg/theindiestone]Official Project Zomboid Discord[/url] mod_support channel.

[h1]How to ?[/h1]
[list]
[*]Get a Screwdriver, a Wrench, a Lug Wrench and a Jack.
[*]Ensure you've read the book associated with your car.
[*]Find a car you can spare, and just start training with serenity.
[*]On vehicle mechanics menu, right click any mounted part and left click on Train Mechanics button.
[/list]


[h1][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2169435993]Mod Options[/url][/h1]
[list]
[*]When using the awesome [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2169435993]ModOptions[/url], you'll have access to [url=https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/2057632705760028119/4AB03D2E01F688F7E3B65F2B46B56E2F29C7FD05/]these options[/url].
[*]Verbose options are logs that reduce (a lot) performances: only for debug analysis.
[*]If your character does not reinstall desinstalled parts: increase the "Delay between actions".
[*]You can select a threshold for uninstall attempts depending on risks of breaking the part.
[*]You can use or not a pause at the end of all actions (e.g. when using time speed increase for a full training).
[*]You can re-try vanilla Uninstall and Install actions until they succeed.
[/list]


[h1]Sandbox Options[/h1]
[list]
[*]You can enfore the failure threshold server side in multiplayer.
[*]The lowest (most limiting) value between the client value (mod option) and the server value (sandbox option) is used.
[*]It is 0 by default.
[/list]


[h1]Tips and Tricks[/h1]
[list]
[*]Remember there is no need to train more than once a day (per car).
[*]You can increase game speed in solo mode.
[*]A mismatch between client and server with B41 Multiplayer? [url=https://theindiestone.com/forums/index.php?/topic/42925-how-to-fix-updated-mods-in-build-41-multiplayer/]Follow the steps here[/url].
[*]The training can reach a stall due to pathfinding. Keep a lot of free space around the car to avoid this.
[*]Broken items will be dumped. (items you uninstalled and cannot reinstall will not be. e.g. a tire will not be reinstalled nor dropped if the suspension is broken and dropped)
[*]Make sure to disable re-equipment before "Train Mechanics" if you're using the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2769706949]Tidy Up Meister[/url] mod.
[*]This mod can be added to or removed from any save (both MP and solo).
[*]Project Zomboid gives much freedom to players and modders, but there are tricky stuff I will not explain a thousand times in the comments below.
[/list]


[h1]Credits[/h1]
[list]
[*]Compatible B40&B41 multiplayer thanx to [url=https://theindiestone.com/forums/index.php?/profile/44935-mamakonda/]MamaKonda[/url].
[*]Uninstall all integrated from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197999348418]Deadly_Shadow[/url]'s "hack".
[/list]


[quote][url=http://theindiestone.com/forums/index.php/topic/2530-mod-permissions/?p=36479]On Lockdown[/url]
This mod cannot be modified by anyone else, for anything else, at all, ever. Even if the user disappears, he or she would much rather you didn't touch the fruits of their hard labour.[/quote]


That's it.

Why are you still here ?
There is nothing more for you here. Get lost !
.. let me remember my first student, sweet Kaylee..

Workshop ID: 2588598892
Mod ID: AutoMechanics

2591232239.title: Auto Move To B41
2591232239.description:
So you are here ?
Ah.. you wanna be somewhere else.
You've come to the right place.

[h1]Point the place you wanna go to with your mouse around you[/h1]
With [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2169435993]ModOptions[/url] you have 3 choices
[list]
[*]Press the key (F1 by default) you have set under: OPTIONS > KEY BINDINGS > Player Control > Move To
[*]Left Mouse Click on ground.
[*]Left Mouse Double Click on ground. (default)
[/list]

[h1]You can also activate a cursor[/h1]
[list]
[*]None. (default)
[*]On the destination of your movement.
[/list]

[h1]Use contextual menu option "Move To Here" on map[/h1]
[list]
[*]This is a stupid idea because you are likely to release your attention and get killed.
[*]This is a stupid idea because pathfinding is not made for long distance and will fail on big obstacles.
[*]Have fun anyway.
[/list]

[h1]Information & Limitation[/h1]
[list]
[*]When used with high speed, the game has problems spawning objects and is late on pathfinding so it is not recommended.
[*]Cursor position not available from Move To request on map.
[*]Works in solo and multiplayer.
[*]For multiplayer server you can override user configuration from sandbox Mod AutoMoveTo options.
[*]All your questions will be answered by the community on the [url=https://discord.gg/theindiestone]Official Project Zomboid Discord[/url] mod_support channel.
[/list]

That's it.

Why are you still here ?
Do you think I made this mod for you to stay around ?
.. Oh right ! The idea was given by [url=https://theindiestone.com/forums/index.php?/topic/38917-implementing-walk-to-hotkey/]tuliomir[/url]..
[quote]
[url=http://theindiestone.com/forums/index.php/topic/2530-mod-permissions/?p=36478]Ask for permission[/url]
This mod can only be added to and extended with the express permission from the original creator. Having received permission, credit must be given to the original creator, both within the files of the mod and wherever the mod roams online.

If no permission is received you may not alter the mod.
[/quote]

You wanna support? A nice word is always welcome. Constructive feedback too. Else you can
[url=https://ko-fi.com/tchernobill] [img]https://i.imgur.com/1xL45if.png[/img] [/url]

Workshop ID: 2591232239
Mod ID: AutoMoveTo

2584991527.title: Auto Sewing B41
2584991527.description:
Automatic Tailoring Training.
Easy hole reparation and patch.
Hole detection and missing patch detection.

So you are here ?
Ah.. you probably wanna protect yourself but tailoring would destroy your fingers and brain.
You've come to the right place.

[h1]Automatic Tailoring Training[/h1]
Click the Train Tailoring button !
[list]
[*]You only have to click one button.(*)
[*]Inventory management is done automatically, tailoring ressources can be in equipped bags.
[*]Real time speed if optimized to the minimum (solo player only for speed increase).
[*]Once ressources are depleted, game is frozen (solo player only).
[*]You still have to spend the genuine in-game time (vanilla friendly).
[/list]

[h1]Easy hole detection, reparation and patch[/h1]
Click the red cross to repair !
[list]
[*]All is accessible from the Character Protection Page.
[*]Tooltip tells you where the hole is.
[*]Tooltip tells you where the patch is missing.
[*]Upper red cross allows to repair all in one click.(*)
[*]Red crosses make it easy to see where the holes are and allow selective repair.
[*]Yellow bubbles make it easy to see where the patches are missing are and allow selective patching (leather only).
[*]Adds bullet protection.
[*]Real time speed is optimized to the minimum (solo player only for speed increase).
[*]You still have to spend the genuine in-game time (vanilla friendly).
[*]If you use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2859296947]MoodleFramework[/url], you have a temporary moodle (15s) that helps you track holes.
[/list]

(*)You still have to loot the tailoring ressources: a needle, lots of threads, infinite amounts or ripped sheets.

Quality of life mod !
Compatible B41.60+ including multiplayer
[quote]
[url=http://theindiestone.com/forums/index.php/topic/2530-mod-permissions/?p=36478]Ask for permission[/url]
This mod can only be added to and extended with the express permission from the original creator. Having received permission, credit must be given to the original creator, both within the files of the mod and wherever the mod roams online.

If no permission is received you may not alter the mod.
[/quote]

You wanna support? A nice word is always welcome. Constructive feedback too. Else you can

2778576730.title: Autotsar Motorclub
2778576730.description:
[h2]This day has come! Autotsar Inc. together with KI5-Production, are pleased to present the new vehicles: [/h2]

[img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1823400596102299329/D50D29B856BC987A175E5F050828334EF6E8047B/[/img]

Classy and fast, can seat 2 people, it even has 2 bags for some light storage. The most versatile model for all death occasions.

[img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1823400596102302227/1EAE9044953AF023C891FED22016F31EC0F8E571/[/img]
______________ [b]1984 BWM R80/7 Monolever - Custom[/b] ______________
It's even faster... no storage, no indicators or mirrors, no passangers, it's for you only! It's like bleach but more fancy.

[img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1823400596102312431/4BAE099BE75961773389D59180C89A6E819DF51A/[/img]

2856174410.title: Better Batteries
2856174410.description:
[h1][i]Better Batteries is a mod that overhauls the built-in battery management system in Project Zomboid.[/i][/h1]
[h1]This mod is no longer supported, as it is rather old and buggy. I have moved onto other projects, apologies![/h1]

[h1]Features:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Ability to remove dead batteries out of compatible electrical tools.
[*]Electrical equipment will maintain their belt / vest position on battery insertion.
[*]Highly customizable Hand Crank that recharges batteries.
[*]Global battery duration multiplier for battery-reliant tools.
[*]Full singleplayer and multiplayer support.
[*]Dynamic battery support system that (shouldn't) break unsupported mods.
[*]Built-in ignore system for dead / charged batteries for battery-reliant tools / hand cranks respectively.
[*]Full English and partial French + Spanish support. (Russian and current partial translations will hopefully be updated soon.)
[/list]

[h1]Officially Supported Mods:[/h1]
[list]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2766033079]Better Flashlights[/url]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2744675505]Lantern[/url]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2887123503]Monmouth County[/url]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2747565374]Sleeping Bags and Attachments[/url]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2831786301]Video Game Consoles[/url]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2335368829]Authentic Z[/url]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2713921292]Undead Survivor[/url]
[/list]

[h1]Why use this?:[/h1]
This mod was created with the intention of reducing the need for "battery stockpiles", whilst also providing a tool that those stuck with limited supplies could make convenient use of. Particularly helpful in dark worlds, low-energy worlds, or nomadic lifestyles. This system only functions to build upon Vanilla's functionality, and can be entirely disregarded if this isn't your cup of tea.

[h1]Support:[/h1]
Want to show your support for this mod and one of my friends? Consider donating to me or checking out their mods!

[b]My Friend's Stuff:[/b]
https://steamcommunity.com/id/UdderlyEvelyn/myworkshopfiles/?appid=108600

[b]My Paypal:[/b]
@pwrcosmic

Workshop ID: 2856174410
Mod ID: BetterBatteries

3022543997.title: BetterFPS
3022543997.description:
[h1]This mod is not a LUA mod and require a manual installation by replacing an existing Project Zomboid File[/h1]

This mod works on Steam or GOG version
Should works on any OS
This mod is Client side and is [b]not required to be installed on server[/b]
This mod works and have been tested in both [b]SP and MP[/b]

[h1]HOW THIS WORKS ??[/h1]
Project Zomboid render a 190x190 tiles zone around the player
This mod reduce the size of this zone and avoid loading not necessary square
This way you can expect 40% to 70% perfs increase

[url=https://ibb.co/wdp8Pnr][img]https://i.ibb.co/L09BcTh/Better-FPS.png[/img][/url]


[h1]HOW TO INSTALL ON WINDOWS[/h1]
- locate your 'Project Zomboid' installation folder (by default should be something like: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\ProjectZomboid")

- open the "\zombie\iso" folder
[code]
ex:
Program Files (x86
└───Steam
    └───steamapps
        └───common
            └───ProjectZomboid
                └───zombie
                    └───iso
[/code]

- in another window open the mod folder (by default should be: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\108600\3022543997\mods\BetterFPS\media\")

[code]
ex:
Program Files (x86
└───Steam
    └───steamapps
        └───workshop
            └───content
                └───108600
                    └───3022543997
                        └───mods
                            └───BetterFPS
                                └───media
[/code]

- select the most relevant folder for you config (this is just obvious preset, you can use 4k even in 1080p this will still increase FPS):
 * \PotatoPC\ if you use a resolution lower than 1080p
 * \1080p\ if your use a 1080p resolution
 * \4k\ if you use a resolution bigger than 1080p

* \Original\ is a recompiled version of the original file

Inside each folder there is another folder \zombie\iso\

- copy this folder (or the content)

- replace the existing folder (or file) from Project Zomboid

ex: 
replace "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\ProjectZomboid\zombie"
with "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\108600\3022543997\mods\BetterFPS\media\1080p\zombie"

This will overwrite the original file with patched one

[h1]HOW TO INSTALL ON OSX[/h1]

- Copy content of this mod archive 'zombie\iso' into your Project Zomboid game folder 'zombie\iso' (replace existing files)
- GoToFolder > ~/Library/Application Support/Steam/

[code]
Library
└───Application Support
    └───Steam
        └───common
            └───ProjectZomboid
[/code]

- Right-clic > Show Package Content > Open Content
  
  [code]    
        Java
                └───zombie
                    └───iso
                            
[/code]

- select the most relevant folder for you config (this is just obvious preset, you can use 4k even in 1080p this will still increase FPS):
 * \PotatoPC\ if you use a resolution lower than 1080p
 * \1080p\ if your use a 1080p resolution
 * \4k\ if you use a resolution bigger than 1080p

* \Original\ is a recompiled version of the original file

Inside each folder there is another folder \zombie\iso\

- copy this folder (or the content)

- replace the existing folder (or file) from Project Zomboid


- launch the game
- Enjoy

[h1]Let me know if you want more aggressive settings[/h1]

3156268584.title: Blackouts [B41]
3156268584.description:
[h2]How it Works[/h2]

- Adds a small chance for power outages to occur randomly at any time of day, and for the power to come back on after a while. Customizable in sandbox settings.
- Adds a 1 point cost trait that spawns you with a hand torch.
- The permanent shutoff date still happens, based on the random shutoff date from vanilla, but it can be overridden with my mod in sandbox settings.
- [b]Now compatible with multiplayer![/b]

[b]Recommended with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2829087246]The Long Night[/url] and other horror mods![/b]

[h2]Events[/h2]

You can trigger Blackout events using Lua mods or the debug console. The following commands are used to trigger events; hopefully their names are self-explanatory:
[code]
triggerEvent("BlackoutsForceShutoff")
triggerEvent("BlackoutsForceRestore")
triggerEvent("BlackoutsRequestServerData")
[/code]

Thanks to the Project Zomboid Discord for helping with the code!

[h2]Latest Upgrades[/h2]

Recently added features:
- [b]Added multiplayer compatibility! Thanks to the help of Burryaga![/b]
- Added weather effect option in sandbox (on by default)!
- Added manual blackout trigger for playtests, modders, and server admins!
- Easy new way to check whether this mod has triggered a blackout:
[code]print(powerDisabledByBlackouts)[/code]

[h2]Compatibility[/h2]

[b]Though we have gone to significant lengths to make this mod play nicely with countless other mods, we cannot guarantee with absolute certainty that our mod will never have a conflict of interest with other mods that rely on adjustments to the hydro power state of the map or ElecShutModifier, because these are the fundamental variables of most power grid management in Zomboid as far as we can tell. Our mod does seem to be playing nicely with Restore Utilities according to recent reports, but please reach out to us on Discord if you have any issues, and we will attempt to help as soon as possible.[/b]

[hr]
[b][u]Check Out My Other Mods![/u][/b]

2988491347.title: Braven's Bicycles Redux
2988491347.description:
[h1]The Bicycle Revolution Returns![/h1]
I always found it a bit odd that PZ didn't have any working bicycles, so I decided to do it myself. Goodbye pollution. Goodbye beaten up cars without gas or keys. Hello freedom!
This mod introduces bicycles to the game. Bicycles are somewhat difficult to find though, so watch out for it!


[b]Obs:[/b] This mod is returning after a long time. I no longer have access to the old bug reports or feedback. Please post any issues you encounter or suggestions you might have!

[h1]Advantages:[/h1]
[list]
    [*]Doesn't require gas or power, you are the engine!
    [*]Makes very little noise, ideal for stealth!
    [*]Highly customizable!
    [*]Since it's a bicycle you don't need keys, just hop in!
[/list]

[h1]Disadvantages:[/h1]
[list]
    [*]The more you pedal the more tired you get!
    [*]You are very vulnerable to attacks!
    [*]Low storage capacity!
    [*]Relatively low top speed!
[/list]

[h1]How does it work?[/h1]
The bicycle is a vehicle that can offer immense advantages, with some costs, of course.
The bicycle works just like in real life. Pedalling tires you but also gives you fitness exp.
Don't pedal to full exhaustion or you will fall off!

The faster you go, the faster you tire.
Pedalling also warms you up if you are cold, and you can pick up the bicycle and transport it.
There are various types of bicycle, and they each have their own exclusive differentials.

[h1][b]F.A.Q[/b][/h1]

[h1]Does it work in Multiplayer?[/h1]
Of course it does!

[h1]Does it work on existing saves?[/h1]
Yes! But bicycles won't spawn on already explored areas.

[h1]What does this mod offer?[/h1]
Please click [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/2988491347/3812906855259848876/]here[/url] to check it out.

[h1]Is the mod compatible with [...]?[/h1]
Please click [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/2988491347/3812906855259854190/]here[/url] for a list of known incompatible mods.
Everything else should work perfectly.

[h1]How do I transport the bicycle?[/h1]
To pick up a bicycle, right click it or use the Vehicle radial menu.
To place a bicycle, simply drop its frame on the ground.

[h1][b]Credits[/b][/h1]
Powered by [b]BitBraven[/b].
Model adjustments and animations by [b]MonkeyShark[/b].
And of course, thank [b]you[/b] for supporting me!

[h1]Like my mods?[/h1]
Join me on Discord and maybe on Patreon if you feel like it!
I also accept Ko-Fi donations. All money is used on mod development.

2981216690.title: Braven's Camouflage
2981216690.description:
[h1]Zombie Camouflage[/h1]
We've seen it in The Walking Dead, we've seen it in Dying Light, it just... makes sense. So why is it not in PZ? Well, now it is! Grab your machette, kill a zombie and start uh... dressing!

[h1]How does it work?[/h1]
Simply right click a corpse and select "Use camouflage". Your character will then take some time to do it, but once its done you will be protected.

After applying camouflage, your character will confuse zombies for a set amount of time (Default is 60 in-game minutes). However, your character will be slightly tired from doing it, as well as (Optionally) queasy, as anybody would be. Needless to say your character will also be all bloodied.

Zombies that spot a camouflaged player will be confused, but [b]NOT[/b] completely fooled! They will still suspect the player, and there is a small chance they will follow them. However, zombies will [b]NOT[/b] actively attack a Player, even if the zombies charge towards them. They are merely confused. If the Player gets too close to a zombie, the zombie will finally distinguish the Player and [b]NOW[/b] will attack them, so stay away!

[h1][b]F.A.Q[/b][/h1]

[h1]Does it work in Multiplayer?[/h1]
Of course it does!

[h1]Does it work on existing saves?[/h1]
Absolutely!

[h1]Is the mod compatible with [...]?[/h1]
This mod shouldn't have any incompatibility with other mods, but if it does, let me know.

[h1]Do I retain camouflage if I [...]?[/h1]
You will lose your camouflage if you leave the game, or enough time passes. Removing all your blood will also remove your camouflage.

[h1][b]Credits[/b][/h1]
Powered by [b]BitBraven[/b].
And of course, thank [b]you[/b] for supporting me!

2934621024.title: Brutal Handwork
2934621024.description:
[h1]Supports B41. Works in Multiplayer[/h1]
[h1]An update for this mod shouldn't be expected until 2025. Definitely at least not until B42 has multiplayer.[/h1]
[h3]A new save is not required[/h3]

[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hlfstr/pz-mods/devel/like_fav.gif[/img]

A combat mod made from scratch for Project Zomboid.  [b]NOTE:[/b] This still needs a lot of work to implement many of the features I would like, but I feel it is ready to receive feedback and be used.  Just know there will be updates that may change things as development continues.

[b]Requires:[/b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2904920097]Fancy Handwork[/url]
Fancy Handwork is required as it fixes many of the animations for holding weapons, adds a modifier key, and I use its functions to syncronize the animation state locally and over multiplayer.

[h2]Features[/h2]
[list]
[*]Equipped Melee Weapons in your Secondary Hand can now attack!
[*]Offhand attack speed is calculated similarly to vanilla, including injuries skills, etc.
[*]Damage Calculation is mostly vanilla (see more about this below), so skills and other factors WILL impact damage!
[*]TRUE Dual-Wielding Melee Weapons! Automatically alternate your attacks (Configurable in Sandbox).
[*]Unarmed Attacks! Punch those Zombies!
[*]Offhand Attacks [b]WILL[/b] collide with the environment!  Break that Window!
[*]Compatible with ALL weapon mods!
[*]Calls ALL relevant Events during an attack, for compatibility with mods that use these Events!
[*]Your ability to shove is still available!
[*]Works with Controllers!
[*]FULLY compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2915572347]The Only Cure but better[/url] by Pao. Keep the ability to attack without your Right Arm!
[/list]

[h2]How to Use[/h2]
Actions for Brutal Handwork will require the Fancy Handwork Modifier Key. By default, the Modifier Key is:

[b]Keyboard: Left Control[/b] - This can be changed in the Options
[b]NOTE: I HIGHLY RECOMMEND[/b] that you either remove or change the default "Aim" binding on Left Control, or change the Fancy Handwork Modifier Key (preferably remove Aim).  They can use the same key, but it may be annoying when further actions are added.  In my opinion, using Control for "Aim" is not a good use for the key, and I will always Right-Click.  As such, Fancy Handwork and Brutal Handwork are intended to replace this key with real functionality.  I do not change this by default to not cause sudden changes to play styles, but highly recommend this.

[b]Controller: Left Bumper[/b] -- Cannot be changed

Moving forward, I will refer to the "Modifier Key" as just the "Modifier".

Simply equip an item in your left hand, and you're good to go!
[list]
[*]If only a secondary weapon is equipped, your player will automatically attack with the offhand.
[*]If you have both a primary and secondary weapon, then you must use the Modifier while aiming to attack with your offhand. Alternatively, enable the Sandbox option to automatically switch between main and offhand attacks!
[/list]

[h3]Unarmed attacks[/h3]
[list]
[*]When unarmed, hold the Modifier while aiming to raise your fists, and press attack.  Available in the Sandbox options is a control to always raise your fists when unarmed and aiming!
[*]Unarmed currently does small bits of damage, but can be used well enough to fend off a few zombies if you're careful.  I have plans to expand this into its own "weapon" skill, allow for unarmed weapons, and more.  For now, these do a small amount damage but are affected by your current Strength and Fitness traits.
[*]Unarmed has no real side-effects, in that you can punch windows and doors no problem.  I plan on expanding this much further, and would like to have the unarmed be affected by your gloves as well as open this up to unarmed weapons.
[*]Unarmed can be disabled in the Sandbox Options.
[/list]

[h2][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/2934621024/3776868105337524453/]Current Limitations and Bugs are found here![/url][/h2]

[h2]Future Plans[/h2]
[list]
[*]First and foremost, I would like to get my damage calculation functions to work over multiplayer.  I have a plan, but need some time to get things done/test/etc. However, for now I need a small break from this and just wanted to release what I have. When this is done, I can give almost full control for combat in the Sandbox options.
[*]Next will be Dual Wielding handguns.  My damage functions will be critical in making this work properly, as they should handle ranged damage already.
[*]I also would like to port the rest of the melee attack variations to be an offhand attack, and overall improve the quality of the animations.
[*]Add progression to combat, so you feel more powerful overtime. For example, at level 1 you have -1 multihit, and at level 10 you have +1 multihit on all weapons, etc.
[*]Add new systems to combat such as: quick throwables, on-demand heavy attacks at the cost of additional stamina, attack combos, possibly charged ranged attacks, etc.
[/list]

[h2]Compatibility[/h2]
[list]
[*]Should be compatible with ALL weapon mods
[*]Likely not compatible with other offhand attack mods, but this is done very differently so maybe? I wouldn't, its untested and unecessary. Just don't.
[*]Mods that modify the AttackHook are not compatible.
[*]Mods that use the various Weapon Events will be triggered correctly for offhand attacks.
[/list]

Source: [url=https://github.com/hlfstr/pz-mods]GitHub[/url]

Workshop ID: 2934621024
Mod ID: BrutalHandwork

3159054833.title: Build It!
3159054833.description:
[h1]Do you enjoy building in games?[/h1]
[b]I absolutely do![/b]
However, I feel that building in Project Zomboid isn't the game's strongest suit at the moment. In my survival experiences, I often found myself constructing square-shaped houses with just one entrance and a few windows, which looked downright dreadful. Now that I've familiarized myself with the map editor, I can finally bring to life what I've longed to see on the Workshop – a small, modest cottage nestled in a convenient location, ready to be adorned to my heart's content.
[hr][/hr]
[h2]What awaits you on the map?[/h2]
Each of the houses comes equipped with light switches and rooms, but their final appearance is up to you.

[h2]Map Features[/h2]
On the map, you'll find a convenient lake, perfect for fishing and replenishing water supplies. Surrounding forests provide protection against zombies and opportunities for gathering construction resources. Additionally, resource gathering zones are fully configured, making this place ideal for building a base and surviving.

[h2][b]Build It![/b][/h2]
This isn't just another dull house you subscribe to and forget about – it's a kind of mini base-building quest that adds purpose to your search for furniture and resources.

[b]Build a base, Gather resources, Defend against zombies, Have fun![/b]
[hr][/hr]
Coordinates: [spoiler] 25x36 | 25x37[/spoiler]
[h3]Resource Gathering Zones:[/h3]
[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/kqJc2Et.png[/img]

[h3]Map:[/h3]
[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/cptaipw.png[/img]
[hr][/hr]
[h2]Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)[/h2]

[b]q: Why do I see question marks on some tiles?[/b]
a: They appear due to the "-debug" mode being enabled in the game's launch options. You can right-click on these tiles and press "Remove" if you don't want to disable debug mode.

[b]q: Can I add the map to an existing world?[/b]
a: Yes, you can, but only if you haven't visited this location in the game before installing the mod.

[b]q: Why doesn't the map appear in my game world?[/b]
a: You may not have configured the map order in the sandbox settings. Make sure the "Muldraugh, KY" map is at the bottom of the list.

[b]q: Is this map compatible with ....?[/b]
a: I'm not sure. If you know of any mods conflicting with this map, feel free to report it in the discussions below.


[IMG]https://media.giphy.com/media/v1.Y2lkPTc5MGI3NjExZHVwY3UxNGNjaDdqMjRscDhxdW5ha2VtdHo4Y3l3NTQ0b2RudDFicSZlcD12MV9pbnRlcm5hbF9naWZfYnlfaWQmY3Q9Zw/Y1l5QeXh0KHRkeDke3/giphy.gif[/img]
If you liked the mod, you can buy me coffee here:
[url=https://boosty.to/hardgridus][img]https://i.imgur.com/vUaRQJ1.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://ko-fi.com/hardgridus][img]https://i.imgur.com/FL5APxv.jpeg[/img][/url]
