2840805724.title: [B41/B42] Simple Overhaul: Traits and Occupations (SOTO)
2840805724.description:
[h1]Simple Overhaul: Traits and Occupations or just SOTO[/h1]

Please, rate mod for promotion. It will motivate me to make more content! Thank you <3

[h2]ALCOHOLIC TRAIT IS DISABLED IN B42[/h2]

[b]Features:
- Rebalanced vanilla occupations, making all of them worth to pick.
- Rebalanced vanilla traits, some of them was completely reworked.
- Adds more than 40 new balanced and necessary traits.
- Adds 26 new vanilla-friendly occupations: Tailor, Deliveryman, Loader, Truck Driver, Soldier, Botanist, Grave Digger, Dancer, Priest, Weightlifting Instructor, Detective, School Teacher, Cleaner, Stuntman, Gas Station Operator, Camp Counselor, Drag Racer, Junkyard Worker, Lifeguard, Demolition Worker, Butcher, Paparazzi, Miner, Store Employee, Criminal, Animal Control Officer.
- New unique traits for vanilla and SOTO occupations.
- You can earn or lose traits while playing the game. For example, you can become Baseball Player, Brave or quit Smoking.
- Visual style that matches the original game.
- Sandbox Options.[/b]

[b]This all-in-one mod is standalone, which means you don't need anything else to make it work.
This core mod changes traits and occupations from vanilla game, also adds more new features.
Balance and flexibility are two fundamentals.
Fair traits costs and no cheating.
Meanwhile trying to still be close to Vanilla-style gameplay[/b]

Works in [B41/B42]
Mod should work completely fine in singleplayer and multiplayer.
Only for fresh game. Unknown bugs can appear with adding it in current savegame.

Summary:
* Most overpowered traits nerfed.
* Most underpowered and unpopular traits buffed.
* Occupations balanced around same way. Occupation start with maximum +2 skill level (except Farmer, Chef and Doctor).
* If you want to understand mod ideology you should check [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/2840805724/3459347019170992971/]Questions and Answers[/url].

[h1]You can find more info about all this stuff here (Google Sheets):[/h1]
>>> https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FlcV3lKgHqfWixly7OwRVYnJHQJ7XhaH5XEHRwEF2DY/edit?usp=sharing <<<
[u]You should copy-paste this link in browser because Steam not allowing to open Google Sheets directly.[/u]
First tab for Traits, second tab for Occupations.

Traits and occupations are balanced from time to time to achieve the ideal state.
Don't be surprised if your favorite trait or occupation buffed/nerfed.

You can discuss this mod in comments or in my discord: https://discord.gg/sSBnUxADDK

Recommended mods:
- [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2685168362]More Description for Traits[/url]

Compatible with:
- (mostly everything but incompatible mods)
- Smoker
- Better Lockpicking (traits)
- Snake's Mod Pack (weight traits)
- Green Fire (alcoholic mutually exclusives)
- Scavenger Skill and Driving Skill (skills for some occupations)
- Excrementum (Sensitive Digestion trait)
- Skill Recovery Journal
- Evolving Traits World: should works fine but with bunch of +1 traits.

SOTO may work bad or be incompatible with next mods:
- any mods which changes vanilla traits and occupations
- any traits which changes Smoker trait and adding Alcoholic trait (required testing)
- Quit Smoking: SOTO already allow you to quit smoking.
- Become Desensitized/Brave: SOTO already allow you to earn Brave/Desensitized traits.
- Extra Traits Effects: both mods affecting same traits, incompatible traits balance. (but you can load ETE after SOTO to make it work.)

Incompatible (and will not be):
- More Simple Traits: SOTO is expanded MST. You may face duplicated traits and unknown errors. Use SOTO or MST.
- More Traits: some traits will not work or work incorrectly, incompatible traits balance. Use at own risk.
- Dynamic Traits: both mods affecting occupations and traits, while doing pretty the same thing in different ways, incompatible occupations and traits balance.
- Occupations Expertises & Balance: both mods changing occupations and I don't want to see traits from both mods at same time, incompatible occupations and traits balance.
- 10 Years Later Professions and Occupations: both mods affecting occupations, incompatible occupations and traits balance.

You always can ask your fave mod developer to add compatibility with SOTO.

[b]I will not make separated occupations mod, do not ask me for.[/b]

Translation:
English, Russian, Chinese (traditional and simplified), Turkish, Korean.
German, by Xantos
Portuguese Brazilian, by Cinissh
Spanish (ES, AR), by Seccio
Italian, by Lore11
French, by Unknouet
Thai, by Riko Prushka
Polish, by Enzoo | Nulled, Glazs
Ukrainian, by SWolf

[B]Every feedback or bug report helping a lot![/b]

Big thanks to authors of "Dynamic Traits" and "More Traits" mods for their support in the development of this mod.

You can support me on [url=https://boosty.to/heafoxyz/donate]Boosty[/url]!

[img]https://i.imgur.com/cKVBRWw.gif[/img]

You can check out my other works:

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3246515001][img]https://i.imgur.com/BL5YjXo.png[/img][/url]

2465017864.title: Simple Playable Pianos
2465017864.description:
Play the Western Piano!  Gain levels in the new Piano skill!  (Builds 41.50 or 41.53+)

The Knox Country Conservatory of Music (KCCM) was founded in Muldraugh in June 1993.  It is the premier institution for piano instruction in the greater Muldraugh area.  They have rated many piano pieces based on difficulty from Levels 0 - Level 10.  Only those who have studied the piano can play pieces above Level 0.  Using the patented KCCM system, anyone can learn to play the piano at a virtuoso level!

Lower your boredom/unhappiness/stress as you play the piano.
Practice the piano (raising boredom) for the greatest xp gains.

4+ new pieces are unlocked at every level!  Ten pieces at level 10!

Warning:  Playing the piano can be heard in the world by nearby zombies and players

New Animation - watch the new PlayPiano animations while playing the piano (Automatically installed for 41.51+)

Controller and Multiplayer co-op support!

-This mod is compatible with existing saves.
-ONLY Build 41.50 requires the Extra Skills System
-Players will walk to the front of the piano to play
-The amount of boredom, unhappiness, and stress reduced is small for easier pieces, but the reduction increases with the difficulty level of the piano piece.
-Stop in the middle of playing, and you will still get a partial reduction in boredom/unhappiness/stress
-Piano levels go from 0-10.
-Practice is available from levels 0-4, and generates more xp (and boredom) than playing alone
-There is a maximum amount of xp you can earn practicing or playing - don't overdo it
-Pianos always face south or east

Special thanks to AuthenticPeach for teaching me about PZ animations and Fragmotion.  Without AuthenticPeach, I'd be using the loot animation for playing the piano.

Thanks to Soul Filcher.  This would *just* be a Simple Playable Piano without the Extra Skills System.

Thanks to Koteczek for PL translations!

Thanks to Chuck and Yooks for helping me with questions while I was making this mod
Thanks to everyone who helped with my Playable Arcade Machines mod, which I borrowed from heavily to do this mod.

Information for copyright holders:
The author of the mod respects the copyright of the copyright holders and all musical works (piano recordings) in the mod do not imply commercial use or any other benefit.  All pieces of music in this mod are used exclusively to create a realistic piano gaming experience.
Any piece of music (piano recording) as part of this mod will be immediately deleted after contacting the official pro-owner.  If you are the official copyright holder and want to remove from the mod - a piece of music that violates your related or copyright contact:

https://theindiestone.com/forums/index.php?/messenger/compose/&to=40411

***** FAQ

- How do I install the new animations?
If you are playing with build 41.51 or newer, you don't have to do anything!  The custom animations are installed automatically.  For build 41.50, contact me and I will send you manual instructions.

- Is manual installation required?
No.  In Build 41.50, if you do not manually install the new animations, you will see the Loot animation when you play the piano.  Otherwise, it will work fine.
In Build 41.51 and after, the new animations will be installed automatically.

- Why do I see a surrender animation when I play the piano?
You have enabled animations in the code, but don't have the new animations in the anim_x folder.  When the code can't find the .x files, it defaults to surrender.  Check the installation instructions and place the .x files in the anim_x/Bob folder.

- Why do I see the loot animation when I play the piano?
The code defaults to the loot animation, and must be manually changed.
If you already modified the code to use the new animations, it could be because an update overwrote your change.  Please change it again.
If you haven't modified the code to use the new animations, that is why you are seeing the loot animation.

- Why do I have to manually install the animations?
You only have to if you are using build 41.50.
In build 41.51 PZ started supporting automatic install of custom animations.

- When I try playing the piano, I get an error.
If you are in build 41.50, make sure you have enabled the Extra Skills System, which is required for the Simple Playable Piano mod in 41.50

- What did you use to create the animations?
Fragmotion

- Can you help me use Fragmotion?
No.  I barely know how to use it and have no plans to use it again.

- Why have I stopped gaining xp in piano skill?
There are limits to how much xp you can gain in around 7-8 hour time window.

- What are the limits to xp gains per day?
You can gain up to 3000xp in a 7-8 game hr period
You can also only practice for up to 360 seconds worth of sounds (not adjusted for fast forward) per session.  After 180 seconds you start to see diminished benefits.  This refreshes 7-8 hours after you practice.
You may play for up to 800 seconds worth of pieces for full benefit.  After 1200 seconds of play, benefits go way down (xp goes down to 0).  This refreshes 7-8 hours after you play.

- Why can't I practice piano anymore?
Piano practice (accelerated xp gains) is only available until you reach level 5.  After that you play to gain xp.

- What's the best way to gain Piano levels quickly?
Practice 360 seconds (real time, before fast forward) up til level 5, then take a 9 hour break before doing it again.
After level 5, play 1200 seconds (real time, before fast forward) to gain up to 3000xp, then take a 9 hour break before doing it again.
You will not be able to gain many levels per day, and at higher levels it should take you more than a day to gain a level.

- Are there piano skill books?
No

- Why are there no skill books?
I wanted to make sure the rate of skill increase was good even if you didn't have a skill book.  Adding a modifier for having a skill book would just make gaining piano levels go too quickly.

- What is KCCM?
The Knox Country Conservatory of Music (KCCM) was founded in Muldraugh in 1993.  It is the premier institution for piano instruction in the greater Muldraugh area.  They have rated many piano pieces based on difficulty from Levels 0 - Level 10.  Only those who have studied the piano can play pieces above Level 0.

Workshop ID: 2465017864
Mod ID: SimplePlayablePianos4150

There are three options (you need to choose one):[/b]
[olist]
    [*]25% - This option is closer to the original, but nevertheless this option is better because sprinters cannot physically run faster than you. They still represent the greatest danger and discomfort, however, as you like.
[*]50% - The most balanced and close to reality option in my opinion.
If you understand a little in anatomy, you can understand that the decomposing human body cannot accelerate and run like a world-class athlete. In general, I recommend you try it!
    [*]75% - Due to the strong decomposition, it will be very difficult for zombies to run, but still they will.
This option is closer to the default slow zombies, and is great for beginners.
[/olist]

[img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1660101375273576639/0C12E325C464F5DC166E5FF2AB70A43581BED64F/[/img]

2026976958.title: Smoker
2026976958.description:
[b]The mod completely changes the mechanics of cigarettes - the cigarettes will be inside the pack.[/b]

Smoker mod - can work both independently and with other mods that change cigarettes, in the second case it can use items and capabilities of other mods. All compatibility information is listed below. If Smoker mod is installed without mods specified in the compatibility list, it will work in the light version mode - with a basic set of features.

[quote][b]Not save friendly! Attention! New game recommended.[/b] If you installed the mod to an existing save, then all vanilla cigarettes in your save will disappear. Further in the game, they will, as before, appear in dead zombies and in the game world.
[b]Do not delete the mod in the save[/b], otherwise you will not be able to load it. After uninstalling the mod, you will need to create a new world. Unfortunately, I don't know how to solve this problem yet.[/quote]

[b]Description:[/b]
• Cigarettes can be removed and put back in a pack.
• Found packs of cigarettes will contain a random number of cigarettes.
• The character will say how many cigarettes are in the found pack when he opens it.
• To pack cigarettes in Cigarette Carton - cigarette packs must be full and closed. You will need tape, or any glue, as well as packing material - newspapers, magazines, books, maps, or 5 empty packs of cigarettes. You can also find Cigarette Carton in the game world.
• Mod contains a burning time fix - for vanilla toilet paper.
• Functional matches in boxes. (45 pieces max / box).
• Matches can be moved from box to box.
• Lighter burning time increased by 200% when used as a light source.
• Convenient refueling of lighters - the lighter can be refueled at any time - Use a vanilla [url=http://undeniable.info/pz/wiki/item.php?Name=PetrolCan]Petrol Can[/url] for this, or [url=http://undeniable.info/pz/wiki/item.php?Name=HCFuelcanister&lang=en]Hydrocraft's canister[/url], or [url=http://undeniable.info/pz/wiki/item.php?Name=HCLighterfluid]Lighter Fluid[/url] from the Hydrocraft mod, or refill with Lighter Fluid - an item from this mod. You can also use fuel bottles.
• [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nicorette]Nicotine chewing gum[/url] - to reduce smoking cravings.
• You can make a smoking device - from a plastic bottle by crushing it and punching a hole in the bottle + making a foil lid from an empty pack of cigarettes and punching holes in the foil. The foil burns out after several uses (the rate of burnout of the foil depends on the trait - Lucky/Unlucky).
• You can disassemble cigarettes to obtain tobacco and filter.
• Cigarette butts can be disassembled to obtain tobacco and filter.
• Ashtrays for cigarette butts. When combined with AutoSmoke mod, your character will automatically throw cigarette butts into the nearest ashtray.
• Cigarette butts can be smoked (when everything is very bad).
• Cigarette butts can be burned in a fire.
• You can sew a special leather tobacco pouch from pieces of leather. The tobacco can be taken from the pouch and put back in the required amount.
• You can make homemade cigarettes from tobacco and paper, with or without a filter.
• [b]To create a Garden Sprayer[/b] - in the Smoker mod, there is a separate "SM" tab on the recipe panel.
• When creating a new character with the "Smoker" trait, the character's inventory will contain items from the mod (a random pack of cigarettes with a random number of cigarettes inside), as well as a lighter or matches (may be empty).

Enjoy.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/BvNpRsd.gif[/img]

[b]Incompatible:[/b]
[b]More Traits[/b] - may not be compatible (user information: It is impossible to take a cigarette out of the pack.)

[b]Compatibility:[/b] Let me know if you find any problems with other mods.
• Steam Remout Play - not supported. (I don't have a gamepad, I can't test it, and I don't use it).
• [b]This mod is fully compatible with the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1703604612]GreenFire mod[/url][/b] without any problems and dancing with tambourines ([b]the GreenFire mod has built-in support for the Smoker mod[/b]) and can use items from it (recommend). In the future, I plan to do even more support for various items from the GreenFire mod.
• Perfectly complements the Smoker - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2643751872]AutoSmoke[/url]. YYou can light a cigarette from the cigarette of another character in multiplayer, automatically put cigarette butts in the ashtray and much more. (I recommend)
• This mod is partially compatible with the[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2923439994][b] More Smokes mod[/b][/url].
• This mod is partially compatible with the [b]Hydrocraft mod[/b] (various bugs are possible, but this is not certain)
• This mod is compatible with  [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2714198296]I Don't Need A Lighter[/url] - Cigarette lighter in the car and other great features current and new version -   [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2883633728&tscn=1669492874]I Might Need A Lighter[/url].
• This mod is compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2812491628]More Loot Settings[/url] - You can adjust the rarity of cigarettes.
• Install - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2857762294]Smoking Sounds Overhaul[/url] for improved smoking sound effects
• This mod is compatible with  [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2289454303]Eggon's Hotkeys & Hot Actions[/url]
• This mod is partially compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2081538550]Hydrocraft[/url] and can use items from it.
• This mod is compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2142069709]Quit Smoking[/url] mod.
• This mod is compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244879881]Soul Filcher's Exploring Time[/url] and can use items from it.
• This mod is compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2719327441]Snake's Mod Pack[/url] + [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2812664856]Le Gourmet Revolution Patch[/url]
• This mod is compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2459400130]Dynamic traits[/url].
• This mod is compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2840805724]Simple Overhaul: Traits and Occupations (SOTO)[/url].

Check  mods:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2268557398]Immersive CD Players[/url] - Take your music with you...
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1945359259]Dreams[/url] - the character will have dreams...
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2268577020]RealBody[/url]

[b]Languages:[/b] English / Russian / French / German / Turkish  / China / Japanese / Spanish / Italian / Portuguese / Polish 

[b]Thank you:[/b]
RagingLoony - Thanks for the help with adding 3D models.

2677920531.description:

2947314444.title: Southwood 2.0,KY
2947314444.description:
Welcome to southwood version 2.0!
Southwood is the predecessor of Riverside. Unlike the world line in Kentucky in 1993, the original site of Riverside has not been gradually abandoned due to relocation. On the contrary, it has explored a new development model and become a small town that mainly relies on industry and agriculture and animal husbandry to achieve economic prosperity.

In the current version, southwood has been extended to 3 × 3cells. You can explore a whole McCoy factory requisitioned by the army, a huge riverview house for you to live in, and complete animal husbandry facilities and farmland to prepare for the b42 version. In addition, there are all kinds of new ordnance stores waiting for you to plunder!
Remember to prepare a sledgehammer when you get to the center of town!

This map occupied cells are mentioned below
(12,19)(13,19)(14,19)
(12,20)(13,20)(14,20)
(12,21)(13,21)(14,21)

3041733782.title: Spongie's Hair API
3041733782.description:
[quote]
[h1]Supports B41 and B42[/h1]

This mod un-hardcodes some features from the base game and fixes some bugs.
[/quote]

[quote]
[h2]All hairstyles of the same length are now available when cutting your hair in-game[/h2]
This removes the issue where you cannot switch from a vanilla hairstyle to a modded one (or between hairstyles from different mods).


This problem happens because Zomboid needs you to give a hairstyle it's own selection of "trim choices" that are available when using scissors. Unfortunately there doesn't seem to be any way to modify trim choices through LUA which makes it impossible to add new hairstyles to the trim choices of vanilla hairstyles or ones from other mods.

This mod replaces the functions used when cutting your hair to remove the trim choices check entirely, so every hairstyle of the same length or shorter is available to choose.
[/quote]

[quote]
[h2]Other Changes[/h2]
Some hairstyles (specifically mohawks) are hardcoded to require hairgel and hairspray - this mod allows modded hairstyles to use this feature, as well as optionally being able to switch to a flattened hairstyle after wearing a hat.

Also fixes a bug where the hair growth timer is reset when tying and untying hair
[/quote]

[quote]
[h2]Should be compatible with Improved Hair Menu if this is loaded after[/h2]
[/quote]

[hr]
[h3]Also check out these other mods:[/h3]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2732662310][img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1829026203560779627/5E8062F3D9436CFE2462DD64024CF8BC7C603969/?imw=200&imh=200&ima=fit&impolicy=Letterbox&imcolor=%23000000&letterbox=true[/img][/url][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2761200458][img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1809894273638294253/C309A1B48537960CF345B18592C67D08881E2A8C/?imw=200&imh=200&ima=fit&impolicy=Letterbox&imcolor=%23000000&letterbox=true[/img][/url][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2463184726][img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1796396866857123559/9DAC4BCE42ACCED08058AD35EF6154F43579E1B4/?imw=200&imh=200&ima=fit&impolicy=Letterbox&imcolor=%23000000&letterbox=true[/img][/url]

2937434637.title: Sprout's Farm and Garden
2937434637.description:
Can’t wait for b42? Well, this should tide you over until then! Harvest 35 new crops and care for animals like cows, chickens, bees, and more. Turns your home grown hops into beer and harvested honey into mead with the cask. Spin your own cotton and wool with the spindle and dry and preserve your foods for the cold apocalyptic winter!

[b]Garden Only Edition:[/b] No animals, just happy little plants and a few quality-of-life recipes.

2759857133.title: Standardised Experience
2759857133.description:
This mod is an updated version of Conqueror Koala's Standardized XP series for B41 multiplayer.

Standardised Aiming XP: Removes the vanilla aiming XP nerf after level 4
Standardised Reloading XP: Removes the vanilla reloading XP nerf after level 4, and has options to make reloading XP less random (or more)
Standardised Sprinting XP: You will gain a set amount of XP every 15 seconds while sprinting, in addition to the vanilla slow and random XP
Standardised Nimble XP: You will gain a set amount of XP every 10 seconds while in combat stance, in addition to the vanilla slow and random XP
Standardised Passive XP: Allows you to configure the rate of XP given to the passive skills (fitness and strength) by every method other than exercise (There are plenty of other mods that change exercise XP rates)

Generally, this mod will allow characters who don't start with points in skills such as sprinting and nimble to still be able to gain some levels in them, and characters that do will be able to get much further than in vanilla. It also makes it possible for characters who don't start with a point in aiming to eventually be able to use rifles.

Features can be toggled and configured using sandbox variables - you can grant xp multipliers to specific skills as well as many mod-specific options.
The entire series (Standardized Aiming, Standardized Reloading, Standardized Nimble, Standardized Sprinting, Standardized Passive) are included in one mod. If you only want to use some of them, you can disable the others with sandbox variables.

This mod works on old saves, but if you're playing singleplayer you'll need another mod to change the sandbox settings. Sandbox settings are not applied immediately - return to the main menu and load after changing them, or restart your server.

If there are any errors or you have any suggestions, please let me know!

Workshop ID: 2759857133
Mod ID: STXP

2366717227.title: Swap It
2366717227.description:
[b]Does the following:[/b]
[list]
[*]Equipped weapons will swap places with hotslotted weapons instead of being put away.
[*] Example: If you have Weapon A on your belt and Weapon B in hand- selecting weapon A will equip weapon A and put weapon B on your belt.
[*]Activating an empty hotslot will attach the equipped item if possible.
[*]Individual hotslots can be toggled via options menu.
[/list]

[h3][b]Required Mods:[/b][/h3]
[quote][b]In B41:[/b]
 - EasyConfig offers options for customization.
 - Both ErrorMag and Modding Alerts are optional.
[/quote]
[quote][b]In B42:[/b]
- EasyConfig is not usable/needed, the game now has native mod options.
- ErrorMag and Alerts are required.
[/quote]

2138726101.title: Tailoring Fix
2138726101.description:
Makes it possible to gain sewing exp from cutting denim and leather clothes.

[h3]Note[/h3]
I made this mod because many people complain that tailoring is broken and it's almost impossible to level up. And now my other mod [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2137687308]Size Labels[/url] makes a bit more sense.

[h3]Ways[/h3]
[list]
[*]Cut clothes to get any Denim Strips (exp depends on count of strips and condition).
[*]Cut clothes to get any Leather Strips (double exp).
[*]Cut or rip clothes of police, rangers, prison guards, doctors, santa claus (exp varies).
[*]Old ways. The mod does not affect vanilla exp from repairing clothes and removing patches.
[/list]

[h3]Limitations[/h3]
[list]
[*]No exp (by this mod) from ripping common clother that is not in the list above.
[*]No way to get any exp from cutting worn clothing items (condition 20% or less).
[/list]

[h3]Cutting Speed[/h3]
[table]
[tr][td]Skill Level[/td][td]0[/td][td]1[/td][td]2[/td][td]3[/td][td]4[/td][td]5[/td][td]6[/td][td]7[/td][/tr]
[tr][td]Time[/td][td]250%[/td][td]200%[/td][td]170%[/td][td]150%[/td][td]140%[/td][td]130%[/td][td]120%[/td][td]110%[/td][/tr]
[/table]
Btw speed also depends on strips count (vanilla mechanics).

[h3]Old Saves[/h3]
You may turn it on and off at any time. Mod progress won't be lost, because it's your Tailoring skill level.

Tags:B41,Clothing/Armor,Misc,Realistic,Bugfix,Tweak


Workshop ID: 2138726101
Mod ID: tailoringfix41

2985394645.title: Take Any Amount
2985394645.description:
[h1]Build 42 Version by KaliLynx[/h1]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3389115640

[hr][/hr]

[h1]Take Any Amount[/h1]

This mod enhances your gameplay experience by granting you greater control over item management within containers. With this mod, you have the ability to select any desired quantity of items from a stack in a container, as well as transfer them into the container that is currently in focus.

Normally, when interacting with containers, you can only choose to grab one item, half of the stack, or the entire stack. However, with this mod, a convenient 'select amount' option is introduced. By clicking on it, a user-friendly textbox opens up, allowing you to enter the precise quantity of items you wish to take.

Moreover, if you intend to transfer items from your inventory to a container, the tooltip now indicates which container is currently in focus, making the process even more seamless and intuitive.

Entering negative numbers, non-digits won't do anything, your game will not crash or throw errors. Numbers larger than the maximum amount will transfer all items.

[h1]Does this work on existing saves?[/h1]
Yes, you can add and remove this mod at anytime

[h1]Does this work in multiplayer?[/h1]
Yes

3171167894.title: that DAMN Library
3171167894.description:
[b]What is this?[/b]
This is a framework that fuels all KI5 mods, one centralized place to fine tune and expand all mods and make them ready for game changes and new features. 

You can find more about it here for B41: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3262959206]that DAMN Library - Crafting, Fixing and Recycling explained[/url], B42 guide is coming soon.

[b]Why do i need this?[/b]
It is a required mod for running KI5 mods, expanding them with crafting and recycling features for almost all parts, handy tire repair kit, plastic welder and many other things. All of those features are already available to most mods already released, try them out.

[b]Why are the comments closed?[/b]
There is no need for them here, all mod related stuff can be discussed on mod pages of those mods.

[b]Can I use this for my mods?[/b]
Not yet, the contents of this library will be changing in the next weeks without any warnings so it's better to wait while we fine tune the things and give a green light for wide use.

[b]I found a bug, what now?[/b]
Hit the discussions of affected mods and give us detailed report of what happened.



[b]If you like the mod, you can buy us a coffee[/b],

[url=https://ko-fi.com/ki5mods][img]https://i.imgur.com/krzPSAF.png[/img] KI5[/url] [url=https://ko-fi.com/bknht][img]https://i.imgur.com/krzPSAF.png[/img] bikinihorst[/url]



[b]Credits:[/b]
[list]
[*]Thanks to The Indie Stone for making this awesome game and all this possible
[*]Shoutout to The Fry, Gilrin, Foji_C, pbmike, Gkmatt, OxTailSafu and martincrup88 for helping with bug hunting
[*]Big thanks to all the people in the community that supported and helped in any way!
[/list]

2906633595.title: The Engineer
2906633595.description:
Let's you craft generators, car battery chargers, blow torches, speakers, remotes and much more. Also lets you disassemble everything and gives a lot more stuff(Depending on electrical skill) from various devices you can disassemble. Everything is balanced out nice and tidy, so you can grind skill from doing some small time electrical crafting but you would also loose valuable material doing so. You need certain combined skills + recipe from a magazine to craft most of the things.

This mod also creates a [b]REAL ENGINEER[/b] profession - costs more but comes with high skill set and with a lot of recipes(Also some from my [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2900671939]Real Metalworking[/url][/b] and [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2890748284]Food Preservation[/url][/b] mods) + more from the magazines. Some high value recipes that are exclusive to this trait -  can't learn them from anywhere else. Makes engineer a very valuable member of your group.


[h1] Extra : [/h1]
[list]
[*]It makes all HAM radios electric powered and lowers the walkie-talkie ranges so they won't be higher then HAM radio ones. It will create a need for possible F.O.B's in some situations.
[*]Mix petrol, fertilizer and charcoal into gunpowder.
[*]Craft a simple blunderbuss gun and ammo for it.
[*]Craft an IED that makes a huge bang - [b][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YPHJco7GAKk]VIDEO[/url][/b] .
[*]You can also mine aluminum and various other stuff with my : [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2963057869]Dynamic Mining[/url][/b] mod.
[/list]










[h1] This is part of... : [/h1]
[b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2900697796]Project Realistic Overhaul[/url][/b] - Set of mods I've created that will overhaul the vanilla game experience to be more hardcore and true to life, but on the other hand leaves you the option to make it through and survive. It makes items and actions have more value and makes the world more alive.


Workshop ID: 2906633595
Mod ID: TheEngineer

2680473910.title: The Workshop
2680473910.description:
[h1] Welcome! [/h1]
This mod adds more crafting features to the game!
With this mod you no longer have to drop your broken tools on the ground.
Now you can disassemble them for scrap (screws, metal parts, wood)
You can also disassemble any metallic vanilla item in the game to get small amounts of metal scrap.
This mod also works with other popular mods like Bushcraft Tools!
To disassemble something you need a Metal Workbench which needs to be learned by a recipe book and some metalworking skill. You can scrap items in the "Scrapping" crafting tab.
This mod also adds a few more crafting items and tools which are needed for the scrap series mods.
All items have 3D models and textures.

2143039189.title: Thread and Twine
2143039189.description:
Adds simple recipes that allow you to make thread, twine and rope from ripped sheets, AND GAIN XP DOING IT!







Ever found yourself in need of any of the 3 and thought to yourself, why can't I just use a series of sheet ropes to make an actual rope?

Or how about, why can't I cut these ripped sheets down into basic threads, which ripped sheets are made of?

And finally, why can't I pull this rope into smaller pieces, twine, and use it for my fishing rod?

No more will anyone be struck down in the wilderness by these silly redundancies!
With this mod, the obstacles that are sewing, twining and roping will no longer be a hindrance to you!
Be free to take on more important matters at hand with this simple mod!

Please note, this mod isn't intended to be realistic and might make tailoring a lot easier for you, but alas, to each their own.

A huge thanks to RapidMinimumBeaver for adding a lot of flavor to this mod, by writing the code to gain small amounts of XP from the recipes.

2769706949.title: Tidy Up Meister
2769706949.description:
[h2][b]The auto-return feature included in this mod has been added to the vanilla game as of Build 42.8.0. However, the vanilla implementation currently does not support certain actions, such as cocking guns, magazine operations, or returning items placed on the ground. As some behaviors are still only covered by this mod, I hope you’ll continue to find it useful.[/b][/h2]

[h1]Overview :[/h1]
Automatically returns to the original equipment when the operation is completed.
[b][i]Confirmed to work with Build 41/42 and also work on MP.[/i][/b]

[h1]Features :[/h1]
[list]
[*]When an action that switches equipment when performed, such as dismantle, is completed, the equipment is automatically restored to its original state.
[*]When automatically returning equipment, if the equipment was in a container, it will be returned to original container.
[*]You can toggle whether or not to re-equipment from the context menu. This setting will continue in each character, so you can use it when you want to continuously dismantle.
[*]For details, please check the introduce movie above.
[/list]

[h1]Additional Actions :[/h1]
These actions can be toggle enable/disable with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2169435993]Mod Options[/url].
[list]
[*]Build actions (Metalwork / Carpentry)
[*]Firearms actions (upgrade / magazine / bullets / rack)
[*]Fitness actions
[*]Eat food actions (Including lighter/match on Smoking)
[*]Take pills actions
[*]Reading actions
[*]Medical actions
[*]Light fire actions
[*]Refueling actions [img]https://imgur.com/cvRLqOL.png[/img]
[/list]

[h1]Options :[/h1]
These options are available with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2169435993]Mod Options[/url] in B41.
[list]
[*]Force Re-Equip : Normally, it will not be re-equipped when the operation is interrupted, but turning it on will force to be re-equipped only hand-held items.
[*]Use Context Menu : Allow the context menu to toggle between re-equipping and not.
[*]Restore Original Location : When returning used items to the ground, they will be restored to their original placement location. [img]https://imgur.com/cvRLqOL.png[/img]
[/list]

[h1]Supported Mods :[/h1]
[list]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3416208765]Bath Towels Overhaul[/url]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2368058459]Better Lockpicking[/url] (Including based on Better Lockpicking)
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2875848298]Common Sense[/url]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2982070344]Inventory Tetris[/url]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3422220305]Picking Meister[/url] (Only in B42)
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2503622437]Skill Recovery Journal[/url]
[/list]

[h1]Known Issues :[/h1]
[list]
[*]Nothing
[h3][b]This mod contains many unconventional implementations and may cause unpredictable behavior. I will do my best to address any issues, so if you encounter a problem, please report to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/2769706949/4638240084912525660/]Bug & Issue Reports[/url] with the following details:[/b][/h3]
[list]
[*]What action you were performing and how
[*]Any potentially related mods
[*]Whether you are using B41 or B42, etc...
[/list]
[/list]

[h1]Future plans :[/h1]
[list]
[*]Bug fix (if exists)
[/list]

[h1]Remarks :[/h1]
[list]
[*]You may add it to your mod pack without confirmation and credit. However, please use at your own risk, as I have not been able to verify that it works with SP.
[*][h3][b]If you were unable to log in to the MP server due to an upgrade of this mod, please try the previous versions by downloading them from "Change Notes".[/b][/h3]
[/list]

[h1]Release Notes :[/h1]
[list]
[*]v1.33 - Supported Bath Towels Overhaul.
[*]v1.32 - Supported Picking Meister(B42).
[*]v1.31 - Supported Skill Recovery Journal, Added flashlight to retain power state.
[*]v1.30 - Improved compatibility with "Grab and Drop" mod.
[*]v1.29 - Supported options for Build 42.
Please refer to "Change Notes" for the older history.
[/list]

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561199151439614/myworkshopfiles/][img]https://imgur.com/VE2Dqpw.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2890440427][img]https://imgur.com/7nnRZhd.png[/img][/url]
[b]My most favorite mod, "Pump Pury" has been flagged as sensitive content and is no longer visible to many users. Please help rescue this mod![/b]

[code]
If you enjoy this mod and would like to support its development, you can do so through the services below. Your support helps keep me motivated and allows me to continue improving and updating the mod. All contributions will be used for development purposes, such as AI service subscriptions. 

[url=https://buymeacoffee.com/pepepepepeil][img]https://imgur.com/7QRjOtP.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://ko-fi.com/pepepepepeil][img]https://i.imgur.com/ULMwSUt.png[/img][/url]
[/code]

2961722002.title: Tile Fixes
2961722002.description:
Fixes and improves various tiles, making them into moveable objects or otherwise making them more functional.
[list]
[*] Floor lamps now function as lights and can be picked up and dismantled. Their light radius is slightly larger than other lamps.
[*] Flood lights emit light in the direction they are facing and have an increased light radius.
[*] ATMs and safes can be picked up and dismantled, and the latter is a container with a capacity of 40.
[*] Standing and wall vaults are now containers with capacities of 20 and 10, respectively, and vaults and safes in banks contain money—now you can rob the bank and get rich, for what it's worth in the post-apocalypse!
[*] Parking barrier gates now stop vehicles when hit, as you'd expect, rather than being able to drive through them.
[*] Antique stoves can now be placed in all four directions.
[*] Industrial ovens now have the IsLow flag, allowing extractor hoods or shelves to be placed above them.
[*] Clothing shop shelves have a clothing overlay that appears when they have items. In addition, the duplicate clothing shelves found in the recreational_sports_01 sheet, that were identical to the normal shelves but non-functional, are now functionally the same.
[*] Coat racks are now containers with a capacity of 10, and have a new clothing overlay that appears on them.
[*] Non-corner hardwood wall shelves (double shelves you can build) fill up visually with more than books; in kitchen room types, they use the same overlay as metal shelves.
[*] Hair salon dryers and barber's poles can now be picked up.
[*] Distillery shelves and barrels can no longer be walked through and can be picked up and dismantled for wood.
[*] Red mobile tool cabinets now have surfaces, allowing items to be placed on them, and the IsLow flag to allow placement of higher tiles above them.
[*] Steel medical counters (like found at the [url=https://map.projectzomboid.com/#13227x2970x6170]Med-U-Well[/url] in south Louisville) can no longer be walked through, can be picked up and dismantled, and count as containers with a capacity of 50.
[*] Surgeon degree certificates and eye test posters have the IsLow flag to allow placement below e.g doctor degree certificates.
[*] Medical mirrors count as mirrors (for purposes of e.g applying makeup).
[*] Microscopes can be picked up.
[*] Bathtubs facing north and west can no longer be walked through and now have plumbing and water supplies.
[*] Wall showers can be plumbed.
[*] Urinals can be plumbed and have a small water supply you can drink from (flush and enjoy).
[*] Gym mats and basketball hoops can be picked up.
[*] Large animal troughs can no longer be walked through and can be picked up and dismantled for metal sheets.
[*] Pizza whirl garbage bins function properly as trash bins and can be used to delete items inside.
[*] Wall bins are containers that function properly as trash bins (as above).
[*] Fossoil, beige shop, and Zippee magazine shelves can be picked up and dismantled.
[*] Concrete road blocks no longer have a cutaway effect when near them like walls.
[/list]

Safe to add to an existing save, with the only caveat being that in areas you've been to before, certain tiles with new functionality—such as furniture newly made into containers—will not be functional as such unless you pick it up and re-place it yourself. It also goes without saying that loot won't spawn in new containers except in new areas, but luckily, you're unlikely to miss out on much other than money (how often can you say that?).

Workshop ID: 2961722002
Mod ID: TileFixes
Mod ID: TileFixes_ParkingGateNoStop

2739565754.title: Tread's Military Vehicle Zone Defs (Spawns) [41.65+]
2739565754.description:
[h1]Tread's Military Vehicle Zone Defs [41.65+][/h1]
This mod adds Military Vehicle Zones (Vehicle Spawn Zones/Parking places) to the game map. It was made for 41.65 version of a game and should work both in SP and MP. Nonetheless I had limited testing capabilities so all bug reports are welcome.

[h3][b]Shoutout to map creators:[/b][/h3] I would be very grateful if you can scan my "objects.lua" from map folder for any clashes with your maps. IF any exist please report them to me so we can think about making mods fully compatible. Obviously I am also ready to assist, should you wish to place any of my custom spawn zones on your maps.

[b]New game strongly recommended[/b] - otherwise this mod will have VERY limited effect.

It bases off NATIVE (VANILLA) map of the game [41.65] and adds military vehicle spawn zones to it.
[b]It will not add any military vehicles, if you do not use any other mod containing them.[/b] To make this mod do anything, you need at least one other mod that adds vehicles using "military" Spawn Zone Definition. Those spawn zones were not existing on native map, but were used by some custom maps.

Example of mods adding such military vehicles:[list]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1510950729]Filibuster Rhymes' Used Cars[/url]
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2490220997]KI5's mods (military ones)[/url],
[*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2705655822]M113 APC by Papa_Chad[/url].
[*]etc. (more names listed in compatibility discussion)[/list]

Military spawn zones I added are spread around Native map and mostly focus on military objects. Nonetheless you can still find some random spawn location here and there.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]

[h2]Scope of the mod[/h2]
This mod not only adds spawn locations for "military" zone (military vehicles as added by mods) but it splits this spawn list into multiple custom classes (light vehicles, heavy vehicles, trailers, burnt etc.). Each custom class is filter based and includes specific vehicles I chose. I tried to include all suitable vehicles from each "military vehicle" mod I found on the mod release date (01.02.2022).

Every military vehicle not listed in my filters will get automatically added to general "military" class and to "light vehicle" class (as the most popular one).

As a bonus this mod assigns whole "military" vehicle spawn list to the existing "army" parking places (merges the lists). I found a few of those already existing on the Native map. Probably TIS added them as a preparation for adding army vehicles in the future updates. Once TIS adds their vehicles, "army" list will include Native ones and any added by mods into "military" list.

Last but not least, most of spawn zones copy existing spawn rates (as they were defined in Vanilla or the last mod editing spawn lists).

[b]DISCLAIMER:[/b]Any strange military spawn is probably not cause of this mod. E.g. if one of your other mods assigns "Ice Cream Truck" to "military" or "army" spawn list, Ice Cream Trucks will show up in military bases etc. It is not fault of my mod but the one that wrongly assigned this car to spawns. My mod adds no vehicles on its own and "reads" spawn lists of all other loaded mods.

[h2]How to use:[/h2]
SP: Activate the mod as usual.
MP:[list][*]    Both server and clients need the mod,
[*]    Clients should activate the mod as usual,
[*]    Server should add mod to its configuration as usual,
[*]    [b]Server should add MAP[/b] by adding "TreadsMilitaryVehicleZoneDefs" (without quotes) in its "Maps=" line of config ini. It has to be added BEFORE "Muldraugh, KY". If you have trouble please google how to add custom maps in MP game.[/list]

[b]Mod should be activated before start of new game or server.[/b] Adding it mid-save is possible but its effects will be almost non-existant. All the custom spawn places will not work and the only effect of adding mod mid-game will be making native "army" vehicle spawn locations work (only on yet unvisited parts of map).
Addition of additional (not active on world start) military vehicle mods is possible on ongoing saves. Those vehicles should get properly added in all yet unvisited areas.

[h2]Technicalities:[/h2]
Due to description lenght limit I move it to discussion. Topic probably of interest only to other modders.

[h2]Future:[/h2]
I am not a professional programmer, experienced modder nor hardcore Zomboid gamer. I made the mod for myself and a few friends to include on our server. I thought that it might be useful for others therefore I share it on Steam Workshop. I will try to update the mod from time to time and fix any bugs found. Nonetheless I do not promise I will have time and skill to do it on any regular basis.
If you wish to fuel my modding activities please consider supporting me:
[url=https://ko-fi.com/tread][img]https://i.imgur.com/SHnNA1r.png[/img][/url]

[h2]Credits:[/h2]
I wish to thank a few people (and groups):
[list][*]TIS - for making this great game,
[*]Kraz - I studied Fort Redstone folder structure and lua's to understand how map zones and map mods folder structure work.
[*]KI5, Filibuster Rhymes, Papa_Chad and other vehicle modders - for the military vehicles this mod can spawn[/list]

[h2]Compatibility:[/h2]
This mod should be compatible with most maps. Nonetheless there is a small chance that some map and some of my spawns might clash. IF they alter exactly same squares on the native map. Please report such cases so I can search for solution.
[b]Vehicle mods compatible with filter function[/b] (as of 01.02.2022) - only "heavy", "burnt" and "trailer" vehicles count - all light ones are sorted OK by default:
List can be found in designated discussion - suggestions welcome!

[h2]Usage of my code in other mods:[/h2]
I do allow usage of my code in other Zomboid mods. If you decide to do so please credit me in description.
I cannot promise regular updates and long-term support therefore I do allow fixing, upgrading, updating etc. my code and uploading its adjusted versions. Nonetheless, please try contacting me first.
Once more I only request crediting me for the work done.

Workshop ID: 2739565754
Mod ID: TreadsMilitaryVehicleDefs
Map Folder: TreadsMilitaryVehicleZoneDefs

2774057398.title: Tread's Paint Symbols [41.65+]
2774057398.description:
[h1]Tread's Paint Symbols [41.65+][/h1]
Were you surprised to find out that in Project Zomboid you can paint only 5 signs using brush and can of paint? I found vanilla selection of painted signs lackluster (softly speaking) and decided to do something about it.

This mod adds 33 new symbols, that you can paint on walls and signs (using Vanilla functionality and items). I also added ability to paint digits, letters and some special characters.

I am no artist (rather a coder), but managed to turn some icons (I found online) into tileset used for those signs. Some of them could be improved upon - if any tile artist would like to refine/swap them then I would gladly accept help.

Mod should work both in SP and MP. It also should be safe to add and remove mid-game (painted custom signs will disappear after mod removal).

[hr][/hr][b]If you encounter bugs, crashes etc. PLEASE report them[/b] - it is the only way I can fix them. [hr][/hr]

[h2]Features of this mod:[/h2]
[list]	[*]Reworked and added categories to "paint sign" context menu,
	[*]Addition of 33 new symbols that can be painted,
	[*]Addition of alphanumeric characters (and some special ones) as paintable signs.[/list]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]

If you wish to fuel my modding activities please consider supporting me:
[url=https://ko-fi.com/tread][img]https://i.imgur.com/SHnNA1r.png[/img][/url]

[h2]Languages (context menu categories):[/h2]
[list][*] English (EN)
	[*] Polish (PL)
	[*] Please post your Translations in proper Discussion[/list]

[h2]Credits:[/h2]
 - I wish to thank Pertominus for showing me easy way of transforming flat icons into "isometric" ones.
 - Big thanks to [url=https://iconmonstr.com/]iconmonstr.com[/url] for all icons I used.
 - Big thank you to icon authors from NounProject.com, whose work I used in this mod:
[list]	[*] Rifles by Alexander Skowalsky ,
	[*] Baseball Bats by Hea Poh Lin,
	[*] Axes by Alena Artemova,
	[*] Scope by Benjamin Sommerlad,
	[*] Bulletproof by Röhl Jonas,
	[*] Books by Orin zuu
	[*] Vhs by Zane Ogle
	[*] First Aid by AS Design
	[*] Cleaning by Виталий Плут
	[*] Resistor by IconMark from
	[*] Tailoring, Kitchen, Vegetables by Adrien Coquet
	[*] Gasoline by Simon Child
	[*] Canned by Chattapat
	[*] Steak by zidney
	[*] Ice Cream by Andrejs Kirma
	[*] Wood, Armchair by Andre Buand
	[*] Metal Beam by Bakunetsu Kaito
	[*] Gardening by YANDI RS
	[*] Sports Car, Compact Car, Van by Blaise Sewell[/list]

[h2]Usage of my code in other mods:[/h2]
I do allow usage of my code in other Zomboid mods. If you decide to do so please credit me in description.
I cannot promise regular updates and long-term support therefore I do allow fixing, upgrading, updating etc. my code and uploading its adjusted versions. Nonetheless, please try contacting me first.
Once more I only request crediting me for the work done.

2487022075.description:
[url=patreon.com/_tsar][img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/2047488292130357038/307A1EFBD98F7B63C736466AACD5CF58235FB88A/[/img][/url]

[quote]
[h1]WARNING[/h1]
#To make the mod work in multiplayer in the server config disable anti-cheat protection for type 12.
AntiCheatProtectionType12=false
[/quote]

[h2]Act 2 - Lying[/h2]

Added the ability to lie on beds, sofas and other suitable items (over 200 tiles for lying).

[u]Lying is not available on some beds that face north or west.[/u]

[h2]Act 1 - Sitting[/h2]

Mod adds the ability to sit on chairs, armchairs, sofas and other items (over 160 tiles for seating). While sitting, all activities are available and all animations are played (reading, eating, drinking, etc.).

[u]Due to the limitations of the game engine, you can only sit on objects directed to the south and east.[/u]

2648779556.title: True Actions. Act 3 - Dancing
2648779556.description:
[url=patreon.com/_tsar][img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/2047488292130357038/307A1EFBD98F7B63C736466AACD5CF58235FB88A/[/img][/url]
Almost all important events in the life of a primitive man were marked by dancing: birth, death, war, the election of a new leader, the healing of the sick. These dances expressed prayers for rain, sunshine, fertility, protection, and forgiveness.

Dancing is exactly what you need in these difficult times. That is why we have published the magazine "Dance".  Explore 45 different dance moves by finding and reading the issues of our new magazine.

We'll remind you that the general partner of the magazine is TMC, the producer of the сereal, Kosmotsars.

Kosmotsars are lovingly made from 100% natural ingredients and whole grains, which is why they are so nutritious and healthy. Each cereal pack contains one trading card that will give you access to a unique dance move. Delight your family with a delicious breakfast, and your neighbors with a wonderful dance.

[img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1660101375273576639/0C12E325C464F5DC166E5FF2AB70A43581BED64F/[/img]

[h1]FAQ:[/h1]
[b]How to dance?[/b]
Open the emotion menu (press and hold Q) and select the appropriate item.

[b]Will the mod work if I add it to an existing save?[/b]
Yes, it will.

[b]How do I learn the dance?[/b]
You need to find and read a dance magazine.

[b]Do I necessarily need a magazine to learn a dance?[/b]
At the beginning of the game, each player knows 3 random dances. The remaining dances can be learned from the magazine, or find a trading card.

[b]What are the trading cards for?[/b]
When a trading card is in a player's inventory, a special dance becomes available to him. Each card has its own dance.

[b]Can I learn the trading card dance?[/b]
No, the dance will only be available if the card is in a player's inventory.

[b]Where can I get trading cards?[/b]
The cards can be found in the сereal, Kosmotsars. These boxes of сereal appear on store shelves, in houses, and in other places where сereal should appear.

[h3]Credits:[/h3] 
Thanks to AuthenticPeach for help with this mod.

[url=boosty.to/_tsar][img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/5071647734847773052/9BE2EEBC53FDD151A5B6DF9290E46BEADC060DDA/[/img] [/url][url=pz.ibrrus.ru/mods/][img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/5071647734847775404/33396705B3590231ED4B47752B428995037DA72C/[/img][/url]

3008448748.title: True Crawl 3.0 [Updated B41]
3008448748.description:
[h1]⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀[b]TRUE CRAWL B41 3.0 Update[/b][/h1][h3][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/3008448748]⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀(Click here)[/url] to see the changelog[/h3]

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀[i]"This mod adds a completely new way to play Zomboid!"[/i]

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀[img]https://media.giphy.com/media/SWcZRKiIiKpi0Ltxzk/giphy.gif[/img]
   ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀[img]https://imgur.com/6OBlYju.gif[/img]

[quote][h2]PLEASE, support my work if you liked my mod. Your support would help me alot to keep working on modding. I'm planning to bring to life a full I am the Legend Mod for B42 soon![/h2]

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ [url=patreon.com/user?u=76595597][img]https://i.imgur.com/q0g31Cn.png[/img][/url][/quote]

⠀⠀⠀[h2][b]FEATURES[/b][/h2]
[list]
[*][b][i]NOW YOU CAN CRAWL BY HOLDING THE "CROUCH" KEY. (DEFAULT = C)[/i][/b]
[*][i]Crawl anywhere you want, using [/i][b][i]W A S D[/i][/b][i] (You can also crawl under vehicles!)[/i]
[*][i]Crawl under vehicles (Use the default [/i][b][i]SHIFT[/i][/b][i] key while crawling near to a vehicle!)[/i]
[*][b][i]NOW FIRING WHILE PRONE HAS A PRECISION BONUS.[/i][/b]
[*][b][i]Prone Hit Chance Bonus:[/i][/b] Increases the Hit Chance while prone.
[*][b][i]Prone Crit Chance Bonus:[/i][/b] Increases the Critical Chance while prone.

⠀⠀⠀[h2][b]Plans for the future (Depends on you)[/b][/h2]
[list]
[*][b]New animations for reaload the weapon while prone.[/b] 
[*][b]More realistic details.[/b] 
[/list]
[hr]
       [h2] HOW THE STEALTH MODE WORKS? [/h2]
The Stealth Mode simple makes the zombie not see the player when it's crawling. The player can configure the sandbox options to change the [b]ZombieRadius[/b] to make the detection distance long or shorter.

       [h2] HOW THE PRONE AIM BONUS WORKS? [/h2]
The bonus, is related to your current Aiming level. It's a modifier that applies the values you've chosen in the Sandbox Options, the more level you have in Aiming, the better is the buff. At least, this is how it's supposed to work. Tell me if you find any issues in the calculations.

[h2]WORKS ON EXISTING SAVES, BUT[/h2]
[i]It's not likely to break your save, but considering it's a [b]UNSTABLE[/b] version, please [b]BACKUP[/b] your save before adding it![/i]


[b]Note:[/b] [i] I don't know if there's any compatibility issue with another mod, if you find something weird, then use the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/3008448748/595150868109611135/]Bug Reports[/url] section to let me know.[/i]
[hr]
[h1]F.A.Q[/h1]
[b]Q: Works with Bandits mod?[/b]
[b]A:[/b] It was designed to work. Give it a try, if you find any issue, report it on Bug Reports with details of the problem.

[b]Q: My character stands up when reloading; Is that supposed to happen?[/b]
[b]A:[/b] YES! This is currently a limitation of this mod; I'll try to add reload animations in the future.

[b]Q: Does this mod works with game pads?[/b]
[b]A:[/b] It's supposed to work. If doesn't ,  let me know.

[b]Q: Can you add "..." feature or make "something"?[/b]
[b]A:[/b] Can you support my work on Patreon? If YES, then, I probably can.

[b]Q: Can you fix this "..." problem?[/b]
[b]A:[/b] Sure, when I have time.
[hr]
[quote][b]IMPORTANT: I don't authorize anyone to copy or change my script without permission. If you want to put my mod in your pack and publish, or make any change to it, you have to ask me first. Thanks![/b][/quote]

2966176354.title: True Crouching
2966176354.description:
[b][h1] I'll update when B42 stable version is released. [/h1][/b]
[hr][/hr]
While sneaking, crouching animations will be played instead of sneaking animations.
In other words, replaces sneaking animations with crouching animations.

Includes crouched [b]idle[/b], [b]walking[/b], [b]running[/b], [b]turning[/b] and [b]SHOOTING[/b].
[hr][/hr]
This mod will very slightly reduce your movement speed while sneaking. This is vanilla behavior.
[hr][/hr]
Has a sub mod named [i]"True Crouching - Shooting Only"[/i].
This will enable only the crouched shooting animations. It won't change sneaking animations.
[b]Enable only ONE of the mods.[/b]
[hr][/hr]
[h1] Why this mod? [/h1]
I don't like the way the character looks while sneaking. I always wanted the sneak key to function as a crouch key so I could roleplay(?).
For example, now I can stand on the edge of a roof, crouch, and plan my next move in a realistic looking way.

[h1] How does it work? [/h1]
[b]Does not[/b] add/replace actual animation files, [b]mostly[/b]. I added animations only for crouched shooting.
There are two base sneaking stances in the game: [i]Sneak[/i] and [i]LowSneak[/i]. LowSneak is the crouching animation we all know from every other game.
Normally, this animation is played only when the character is sneaking next to a wall.
I just changed a few lines in some files so that the game plays animations of LowSneak instead of Sneak whether the character is next to a wall or not.

[h1] To do [/h1]
[h3](maybe...)[/h3]
[list]
	[*]Prevent crouching while fractured(and/or burnt?)
	[i](the game allows LowSneak while fractured/burnt in vanilla)[/i]
	[*]Add buff to hit chance when crouched
	[*]Swapping weapons while crouched and aiming a weapon shouldn't transitions to standing
	[*]Block aim ready stance while crouch aiming with melee if there are no zombies in range so the char doesn't stand up
[/list]

[h1] Notes [/h1]
[list]
    [*][b]Conflicts with:[/b]
		[list]
		[*]Arsenal GunFighter ([i]Compatibility addon [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3004680063][u]here[/u][/url][/i])
		[*]Real Full Auto ([i]Weapons will use their default fire rate while shooting crouched[/i])
		[*]Katana Stance ([i]Character will not crouch when idle while holding a katana[/i])
		[*]Braven's Nail Guns ([i]Nailguns' fire rate will be reduced while shooting crouched[/i])
		[/list]
    [*][b]Safe[/b] to add/remove mid-save.
	[*]Works in multiplayer.
    [*]Feedback/Suggestions are welcome.
[/list]

[h1] Recommended mods [/h1]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3008448748] True Crawl [/url] - Adds a [b]prone[/b] stance to the game!
                     You can [b]crawl[/b] everywhere and [b]shoot[/b] while prone.
[h2]Check out my other mods[/h2]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2920735875][IMG]https://i.imgur.com/uMPsEoo.png[/IMG][/url][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2921642476][IMG]https://i.imgur.com/K6Zhrv7.png[/IMG][/url][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3013901070][IMG]https://i.imgur.com/RPS3sfG.png[/IMG][/url]

[hr][/hr]
                                                [url=https://www.buymeacoffee.com/the_bobcat][IMG]https://img.buymeacoffee.com/button-api/?text=Buy%20me%20a%20coffee!&emoji=&slug=the_bobcat&button_colour=ff8700&font_colour=000000&font_family=Cookie&outline_colour=000000&coffee_colour=FFDD00[/IMG][/url]
My third mod. Learned a little PZ animation.
It took a few hours to figure out how to do it. Then I implemented crouched shooting which really wore me out :/
                                                       [IMG]https://i.imgur.com/6OBlYju.gif[/IMG]
[hr][/hr]
Workshop ID: 2966176354
Mod ID: TrueCrouching
Mod ID: TrueCrouchingSO

2613146550.title: True Music
2613146550.description:
[url=patreon.com/_tsar][img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/2047488292130357038/307A1EFBD98F7B63C736466AACD5CF58235FB88A/[/img][/url]

[h1] It's time for true music in Project Zomboid again. [/h1]
The mod allows all users to add their music to the game. In addition, you can add your own vinyl covers.

Features of the mod:
[list]
[*]item "Boombox" (powered by batteries)
[*]item "Pocket player" (powered by batteries)
[*]item "Vinyl player" (works only on electricity)
[*]all cars are equipped with a cassette player
[*]playing music lures zombies
[/list]

[quote]
[h3]How to add your own music in SINGEPLAYER (only for Windows):[/h3]
Video tutorial: https://youtu.be/9DZghSBPOy4
[olist]
[*]Go to \workshop\content\108600\2613146550\mods\True Music\media\yourMusic

[*] Extract the contents of yourMusic.rar [b]or[/b] yourMusic.zip (before rename the file "yourMusic.zi" to "yourMusic.zip")  to the yourMusic folder.

[*]Place audio files in mp3, wav, ogg format in the TCBoombox and TCVinylplayer folders.

[*](optional) Place vinyl cover photos in TCVinylplayer folder in jpg format. They should be named the same as the music track file. Each music file can have its own cover.

[i]For example, the file with the track is called "AC DC - Highway To Hell (1979).mp3", the file with the cover should be called "AC DC - Highway To Hell (1979).jpg".[/i]

The easiest way to find the cover is when you google it: "AC DC - Highway To Hell vinyl cover".

[*]Run AddYourMusicToTheMod.exe. Depending on which folder the files is placed in, either a cassette or vinyl will be generated.

[*]After that, your cassettes and vinyl records will start spawning in the world, you just have to find them.
[/olist]
[/quote]


[quote]
[h3]How to add your music in the MULTIPLAYER:[/h3]
Video tutorial: https://youtu.be/b7SUjPzmgfM
[olist]
[*] Create a new mod from the template: https://disk.yandex.com/d/iS8o8ZxnV7UxLA

[*] [b]WARNING[/b] In the file mod.info change the ID to your own
[*] [b]WARNING[/b] To ensure that your mod does not conflict with other True Music addons, you need to rename the files:
[code]media\lua\server\Items\TCGLoadingTCBoombox.lua
media\lua\server\Items\TCGLoadingTCVinylplayer.lua
media\lua\shared\TCGMusicDefenitionsTCBombox.lua
media\lua\shared\TCGMusicDefenitionsTCVinylplayer.lua
media\scripts\TCGMusicScriptTCBoombox.txt
media\scripts\TCTCGMusicScriptTCVinylplayer.txt
media\scripts\TCGSoundsTCBombox.txt
media\scripts\TCGSoundsTCVinylplayer.txt[/code]
For example, add your mod Workshop ID to their names:
[code]media\lua\server\Items\TCGLoadingTCBoombox2722332157.lua
media\lua\server\Items\TCGLoadingTCVinylplayer2722332157.lua
media\lua\shared\TCGMusicDefenitionsTCBombox2722332157.lua
media\lua\shared\TCGMusicDefenitionsTCVinylplayer2722332157.lua
media\scripts\TCGMusicScriptTCBoombox2722332157.txt
media\scripts\TCTCGMusicScriptTCVinylplayer2722332157.txt
media\scripts\TCGSoundsTCBoombox2722332157.txt
media\scripts\TCGSoundsTCVinylplayer2722332157.txt[/code]
[*] Send the mod to all users of the server (we allow to publish a mod created from the template)
[*] If you want to upload your work to Workshop, you will need to delete folders and files:
[code]
\media\yourMusic\audioConverter
\media\yourMusic\pictureConverter
\media\yourMusic\AddYourMusicToTheMod.exe
\media\yourMusic\DeleteYourMusicFromTheMod.exe
[/code]
[/olist]
[/quote]

[img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1660101375273576639/0C12E325C464F5DC166E5FF2AB70A43581BED64F/[/img]
